title: 0.03 mm Ultra-Thin Skin Hair System
body_html:
Ultimate Realism Ultra-Thin 0.03mm Skin Hair System with A-Grade Indian Hair Experience the pinnacle of natural appearance with our Ultra-Thin 0.03mm Skin Hair System. Crafted using revolutionary 0.03 mm ultra-fine polyurethane, this hair system becomes virtually invisible when applied, delivering an unparalleled seamless look. Our unique attachment process eliminates the need for knots, resulting in a lighter, albeit more delicate, unit. This does make the hair strands more susceptible to shedding over time, which is why this system is tailored for those who prefer to refresh their look more frequently. Offering a shorter lifespan of 1-3 months, this unit is priced affordably for users who like the freedom of regular updates, ensuring you can always showcase fresh, natural-looking hair. Key Features

body_html:
0.08mm Ultra-Thin Poly Hair System

0.08mm Ultra-Thin Poly Hair System: Realism Meets Durability Experience a new standard in both appearance and endurance with our Ultra-Thin Poly Skin Hair System. Designed with a 0.08mm transparent polyurethane base, this hairpiece combines an impressively natural look with long-lasting wear. 

The advanced, thicker poly material minimizes shedding, offering you a reliable solution. Each hair strand is anchored to the base through expertly created single split knots for added security. Indulge in a luxurious appearance with our premium-grade Indian hair, crafted for both elegance and longevity.

The carefully chosen adhesive formulation provides a dependable and durable bond between the thin skin base and your scalp. As a result, you'll enjoy the benefit of reduced maintenance and fewer adjustments compared to lace-based systems. With its exceptional combination of features and first-rate materials, this hair system emerges as a premier option for those striving for the perfect blend of realism and durability.

title: 0.08 mm Thin Skin With Lace Front
body_html:
Skin Hairpiece For Men With French Lace Front Skin hair system with lace front is designed using a new generation, thin poly (skin) base material with about 1.5 inches of lace material for the front and hairline, offering both a durable unit and a realistic and natural look. This toupee for men is perfect for those looking for a low-maintenance system (skin material) but who prefer the effect of the lace material for the hairline look. For the skin material part, the adhesive is applied to both the skin material and the scalp, creating a strong and long-lasting bond. title: 1522 Clear Tape Contours Strips
body_html:
1522 Clear is our most popular daily wear tape. It’s known for being gentle on skin. It is an inert tape so nothing can cause a skin reaction, making this tape a great hypoallergenic option. This tape leaves very little residue, making it popular for day-to-day use. The liner and backing are white but the actual tape is clear. Not ideal for mesh units because it has some shine.

Space

  • Systems: Poly
  • Dullness: Shiny
  • Gentleness: Medical grade
  • Residue: Low
  • Liner: Printed white (tape is clear)
  • Carrier: Stiff
  • Thickness: 6.3 mil
  • Comparable: Top Stick
  • Daily Wear: 1 – 7 Days 
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use
  • Professional Use Only

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 6.3 mil

Directions:

  1. Peel the scored liner off
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive
  3. Place the piece where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining liner pieces
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • Rolls: 3yd, 12yd, 36yd
  • Contours: A, AA, B, BB, C, CC
  • Straight Strips: 1/2″ x 3″, 3/4″ x 3″, 1″ x 3″
  • Minis

title: 1522 Contour Tape Strips
body_html:
An industry favorite, this daily wear tape is a hypoallergenic Medical-Grade Toupee and Wig Tape known for its mild properties and easy clean up. 

  • Base: All
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Skin Safe
  • Hold: Daily Wear (1-7 days)
  • Medical Grade
  • Comparable: Walker's 1522® and Vapon's TopStick®


Directions: 

Step 1: Peel the scored line on strips and contours
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply to your client's scalp.

 

All contours come in packs of 36 and Bulk Bags come in a pack of 1,000.

title: Action Spray Solvent (Sensitive Skin)
body_html:
Many clients have sensitive skin, so they generally need skin safe solvents for system removals. However, many of these solvents are slow by nature. That’s why we developed Action Adhesive Remover. This remover is gentle on sensitive skin, but works quickly to break down adhesive.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Oil
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Breakdown Speed: Fast
  • Residue: Medium
  • Cleanup: Rinse with soap and water
  • Fragrance: Citrus
  • Flammable
  • Professional Use Only
  • Fast Acting
  • Rinses off with soap and water

Ingredients

Citrus Oils, Petroleum Hydrocarbons, Lanolin, Fragrance

Directions:

  1. Saturate adhesive area.
  2. Breakdown will begin in seconds.
  3. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup.
  4. Wipe or brush off residue.
  5. Shampoo and rinse.

Cautions

  • Close cap tightly.
  • Do not leave on silicone bases more than 2-3 minutes.
  • Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
  • Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
  • Do not breathe fumes.
  • External use only, do not ingest.
  • Avoid eye contact.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • Test on a small area before use.
  • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F.

SDS Sheet (PDF)

Available Sizes

  • Spray 4 oz
  • Spray 12 oz
  • Gallon (128 oz)

title: Bond Breaker Shampoo
body_html:
Walker Tape's Hair System's Adhesive Remover Bond Breaker Shampoo 10oz

Adhesive Remover Bond Breaker Shampoo 10oz

title: C-22 Adhesive Remover Solvent Spray
body_html:
Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is the ultimate solution to your hair system needs. Widely considered as the best hair system solvent on the market, it's not just any ordinary solvent - it is the most popular and fastest working skin-safe solvent, ensuring that you get the results you need in no time.

With its oil-based formula, Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is safe for all systems and has a fresh citrus scent, making it an ideal choice for people who are looking for both quality and fragrance.

It's worth noting that Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is a great fit for stylists looking for a fast and efficient breakdown speed. However, it is essential to keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light to maintain its quality. Store it in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F), and make sure to close the bottle lids tightly for added protection.

Moreover, with proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months, so you can enjoy the benefits of C-22 Solvent for an extended period.

When it comes to effectiveness, this citrus solvent is unrivaled. It is highly effective on most tapes and soft bonds, making it an excellent solution for your hair system needs. Not only that, it has a fresh-smelling citrus fragrance, which makes the process more enjoyable. It is also very gentle on the skin and easily rinses off with soap and water, ensuring that your skin stays healthy and moisturized.
In conclusion, Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is the ultimate solution to your hair system needs. Its effectiveness, safety, and fragrance make it an ideal choice for anyone looking for a reliable hair system solvent.


Benefits of using Walker Tape C-22 Solvent for Hair Systems

  • Citrus Scent

  • Fast-acting Skin-Safe Solvent

  • Oil-Based Formula that Rinses Easily with Soap and Water

Ingredients:

The solvent contains Organic Wetting Agents, Petroleum Hydrocarbons, Citrus Oils, and Lanolin.

How to Use Walker Tape C-22 Solvent for Hair Systems

Instructions:

  • Spray on adhesive area and leave for 1-5 minutes depending on adhesive buildup.

  • Wipe or brush off residue.

  • Shampoo and rinse.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Tips for Doing a Solvent Soak Using Walker Tape C-22

  • Fill a large bowl or sink with C-22 Solvent.

  • Place the system into the solvent, base side up.

  • Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build-up off.

  • Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution.

  • Shampoo the system and rinse.

  • Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.


Available Sizes:

  • 4 fl oz, Spray

  • 12 fl oz, Spray

  • 128 fl oz, Gallon

Cautions When Using Walker Tape C-22 Solvent

  • Flammable

  • Store in Cool and Dry Place

  • For External Use Only

  • Test on a Small Area before Use

  • Keep out of Reach of Children

title: Clean Red Contour Tape
body_html:
Here is the perfect balance between strong hold and ease of cleaning for your hair system maintenance: Our new Clean Red tape.

Clean red was created to fill the gap between our more aggressive tapes, which give you a longer hold, and the tapes focused on treating allergies, whose hold is too short for prolonged use. With this aim in mind, Clean red is conceived to offer you the most hygienic option and a relatively strong hold. Apart from providing appropriate hold, the ease of cleaning and non-aggressive adhesion makes it an ideal tape for everyday use.

 

Advantages

  • Strong hold for up to 7 days.
  • Maximum hygiene: minimal residue and very easy to clean.
  • Ideal for users who are looking for a slightly longer duration than a few days, and who are also not looking for the longest duration.
  • The liner is red, but the tape is transparent.
  • Especially suitable for skin hairpieces and extensions.
  • Available in a 3-metre cuttable format.
  • Specific formulation for hair adhesion in prostheses, wigs, and extensions.

 

Format

Each bag contains 36 tapes of 8,5 x 2 cm.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Remove the paper from one side and glue it on the scalp at the desired attachment points. At the edges, placing the tape 2 millimeters behind the reference line is recommended.
  • Once placed on the scalp, remove the paper from the other side of the adhesive to glue the hair system.
  • For backcombed toupees, where a very natural hairline is desired, liquid adhesive is highly recommended.

title: Conditioning Nourishing Shampoo
body_html:
Designed for the specific care of hair systems and hair extensions. LuxHair's Conditioning Shampoo repairs, nourish, and protects hair fibers from external damage such as the sun, heat, hair products, pollution, etc.

 

Advantages

  • Deeply repairs and nourishes hair.
  • Enhances color and shine.
  • Combats dryness.
  • Contains sun protection (UV)

 

Active Ingredients

Contains kerestone, bio-keratin, chia oil, trace elements, brewer’s yeast, and ginseng.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Apply a small amount to the damped hair system. Wash the hairpiece by massaging it with circular movements.
  • For Lace or Monofilament system, untangle the hair by stroking it as the shampoo soak through the base. 
  • For Skin systems apply the shampoo on both sides of the piece. On the base side, wash with circular movements, while the hair side should be untangled by stroking.
  • Finally, after a few minutes, rinse your system with plenty of water. Inappropriate rinsing may result in poor adhesion of tapes and glues.

title: Extenda-bond Plus Tape Rolls
body_html:
We’ve made our classic product even better. Not only is it more affordable than the original Extenda-Bond, it comes with more strips per box. 100 pieces to be exact. It also has a better box design that features a perforated lid that can be torn off for easy access in your salon. More strips, better box, no brainer.

Extenda-Bond Plus is super strong and super flexible. It features our fingerprint technology to make it basically invisible under any unit. The liner is blue and white but the actual tape is clear.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Semi-Dull
  • Gentleness: Skin Safe
  • Residue: High
  • Liner: Blue and white (tape is clear)
  • Thickness: 10.5 mil
  • Carrier: Stretchy
  • Maximum Wear: 4+ Weeks
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use
  • Professional Use Only

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 10.5 mil

Directions:

Straight Strips and Contours Directions:

  1. Peel the scored liner off
  2. The adhesive side is placed towards unit. Avoid touching adhesive
  3. Place the tab where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, remove tabs
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Rolls Directions:

  1. Peel the tape from the roll and cut the desired length.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive
  3. Place the piece where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining liner pieces
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • 12″ x 1.5″ Strips (Available as 100 count boxes or single strips)
  • 3/4″ x 1 1/2″ Minis
  • 3/4″ x 3 YD (108″) Roll
  • 3/4″ x 36 YD Roll

title: Extreme Hold Silicone Adhesive
body_html:
Our strongest silicone-based, liquid adhesive.

Extreme Hold is one of our best adhesives. It has a silicone-base, a long-lasting hold (4+ weeks), and is skin safe. It dries clear and even offers a water-proof hold to help keep your clients looking great without affecting their lifestyle.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Silicone
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Hold: 4+ Weeks
  • Comparable: No-Tape®
  • Clear when dry
  • Waterproof
  • Flammable

Ingredients

Ethyl Acetate

Directions:

  1. Prepare client’s scalp with 99% Alcohol and Max Hold Sport.
  2. Use sponge brushes to apply a thin, even coat of EXTREME HOLD to scalp.
  3. Blow dry until tacky.
  4. Repeat once more, then press hair system onto scalp, firmly holding for 10 seconds.

Cautions

  • Close cap tightly.
  • Do not breathe fumes.
  • Store below 90°F Test on small area before use.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • External use only. Avoid eye contact.

SDS Sheet (PDF)

Available Sizes

  • Brush-On .5 oz
  • Brush-On 1.4 oz
  • 4 oz
  • Pint (16 oz)

title: For Women Only
body_html:
For Women Only Sensitive Skin Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs is designed specifically for women with delicate skin. Some harsher adhesives will react with a women’s body chemistry to produce discomfort, rashes or sore spots on the scalp. This sensitive skin formula is designed to be super gentle on the skin while providing the superior hold that you expect from Pro Hair Labs. For Women Only contains no harsh chemicals and no toxic ingredients so you can feel confident that you will get a superior hold that is safe and gentle to your skin. Works best with polyurethane hair systems but will also work well with lace units.

  • For Women Only Sensitive Skin Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs is designed specifically for delicate skin.
  • Specially designed for high humidity, heavy perspiration and oily scalps to give a reliable bond regardless of the conditions.
  • For Women Only works best with polyurethane hair systems but will also work well with lace units.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins and no latex so it is 100% safe for your skin.

   <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">Make Your Hair Dreams a Reality!</h3>

   <p class="a-spacing-base">Imagine this: every morning, you wake up excited to style your wig, knowing it's going to be a flawless, love-at-first-sight experience. With GHOSTBOND Classic, that's the reality our customers step into.</p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">It's more than just an adhesive; it's the key to unlocking your confidence and self-expression.      </noscript>
    </div>
    <div class="apm-sidemodule-textright">
     <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">How to Apply GHOSTBOND Classic Wig Glue</h3>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Poly Systems:</span></p>
     <p></p>
     <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply one thin coating of GHOSTBOND Classic to the hair system base and 4 thin coatings to the head. Apply each coat as soon as the previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat, wait 7 minutes and press the hair system into place.</span></li>
     </ul>
     <p></p>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Lace Systems:</span></p>
     <p></p>
     <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply 4 thin coatings of GHOSTBOND Classic to the scalp only. DO NOT APPLY TO THE LACE BASE. Apply each coat as soon as the previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat, wait 7 minutes and press the hair system into place.</span></li>
     </ul>
     <p></p>

  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> LIGHT-HOLD HAIR REPLACEMENT GLUE: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive is made especially for keeping your hair replacement systems secure. It's like a special glue that gently sticks them to your skin and scalp. We've done lots of research and testing to make sure it's really good quality and safe to use. With our advanced adhesion technology, it provides maximum hold even in tough situations like excessive sweating, extreme moisture, and high temperatures. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> INVISIBLE BONDING FOR NATURAL HAIR LOOKS: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive works with both poly and lace hair replacement systems. Once you apply it, it creates an invisible bond that hides your hairline and makes your wig or hairpiece look totally natural. It's perfect for both boys and girls, men and women! Plus, our quick-drying and clear formula absorbs light and blends with your skin tone, making your hairline undetectable. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> DESIGNED FOR OILY SCALPS, HIGH HUMIDITY & HEAVY PERSPIRATION: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive is specially made for people with oily skin and scalps, or if you sweat a lot. It even works great in places with lots of moisture and humidity. It gives a strong hold, so you don't have to worry about your lace front wigs or toupees coming off. Our adhesive is suitable for oily skin, effectively masking yellow sebum excretion and protecting against skin oils or wetness. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> WATER AND OIL-RESISTANT: When you wear a wig or toupee, you want to feel confident and not worry about it moving or falling off. That's why our bonding glue is water resistant, so it won't come off if it gets wet. It's also resistant to natural skin oils, keeping your hair in place and looking and feeling natural. And the best part? Our adhesive is shower safe, so you can confidently step into the shower without worrying about your hair system losing its bond. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> FREE OF LATEX, HARSH SOLVENTS, AND TOXIC INGREDIENTS: Our GHOSTBOND XL is designed with your sensitive skin and scalp in mind. We ensured it had no bad chemicals, latex, or toxic ingredients. Even when you remove your hairpiece, you can use a safe adhesive solvent like rubbing alcohol instead of other harsh things that might bother your skin. Our high-performance clear glue is manufactured to strict standards, ensuring 100% safety and no harsh chemicals. </span></li>
 </ul>

title: Ghost Buster
body_html:
Safely remove all traces of adhesive from your hair replacement unit with Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover by Pro Hair Labs. Designed specifically for use on all hair types, Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover is free of aloe and lanolin so there is no greasy residue or moisture to interfere with future adhesion to your skin. Yet, Ghost Buster Adhesive remover is gentle enough to keep all hair color intact.

  • Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover from Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated for removing adhesive from hair replacement units.
  • Contains no aloe or lanolin so there is no oily or greasy residue that would interfere with future adhesive.
  • Works well as a routine preparation step to keep your hair unit looking its best.
  • Safe and effective on all hair types. Will not alter hair color.

Safely remove all traces of adhesive from your hair replacement unit with GHOSTBUSTER Adhesive Remover by Pro Hair Labs.

body_html:
Looking at a product that's tough to remove all trace of adhesive residue from your hair, Ghost Buster is what you needed. Ghost Buster by Pro Hair Labs developed for hair system only, designed to clean all types of hair systems whilst protecting from damage. It contains no aloe or lanolin, keeping your hair system free from grease and oil residue which can interfere with the adhesion process. This product is highly refined, proven competently and comprehensively removes residue from all types of hair whatever bonding product you are using.

  • ☑️ FAST AND HIGH PERFORMANCE - Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover from Pro Hair Labs, made from Ireland, is specially formulated for removing adhesive residue and cleaning all types of hair replacement units without damaging the hair. Quickly neutralizes the stickiness of extension tape and wig glue. The easiest and best product on the market for removing adhesiv
  • ☑️ SAFE AND PROVEN EFFECTIVE - This product is highly refined and proven to remove adhesive residue competently and effectively from all types of hair whatever cosmetic bonding product used. 100% safe for your scalp, hair, and skin. Appropriate to use for both men and women. Trusted and Recommended by Leading Hair Extension Professionals Worldwide.
  • ☑️ PROTECT FROM HAIR DISCOLORATION - Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover is powerful to blast away every trace of your hair adhesive yet gentle enough and protects from discoloration. Works well as a routine preparation step to keep your hair unit looking its best. It's fantastic!
  • ☑️ SALON-INSPIRED & APPROVED - With salon-quality ingredients, your scalp health will improve and it temporarily neutralizes the stickiness of extension tape or wig glue allowing it to be easily removed. It contains no aloe or lanolin so no oily or greasy residue would interfere with the future adhesive.
  • ☑️ RECOMMENDED AND EASY APPLICATION: Simply spray the Ghost Buster Adhesive Remover on the scalp and let it sit for 1-5 minutes to soften adhesives for easier removal and gently rub to lather. Highly recommended by cosmetologists and extension experts. Try it and you will love it!

title: Ghost Mist
body_html:
Keep your hair looking and feeling great with Ghost Mist Finishing Spray by Pro Hair Labs. This unique spray is infused with Moroccan Argan Oil to make your hair soft, manageable and glowing. This hair safe formula is designed for natural and synthetic hair. Lightly spray your hair with Ghost Mist and comb through. The powerful antioxidants and nourishing vitamins help to detangle hair, repair split ends and provide UV protection. Ghost Mist is safe to use with heat styling tools and will help protect your hair from damage. For the silky, smooth, shiny hair that you deserve, try Ghost Mist today.

  • Ghost Mist Finishing Spray by Pro Hair Labs is infused with Moroccan Argan Oil to make your hair shiny, soft and manageable.
  • Infused with antioxidants and nourishing vitamin E to help detangle hair and repair split ends.
  • Provides protection from UV rays and heat styling products.
  • Works on both human and synthetic hair.
  • Lightly mist and comb through hair for a brilliant shine.

GHOSTMIST Finishing Spray by Pro Hair Labs is infused with Moroccan Argan Oil to make your hair shiny, soft and manageable.

title: Ghost Mist UV Protector Finishing Conditioner Spray
body_html:
Professional Hair Lab's Ghost Mist Finishing Argan Oil Moisturiser Conditioner UV Protector Spray 6oz

Ghost Mist UV Protector Finishing Conditioner Spray 6oz

Ghost Mist Finishing Spray with Argan Oil is a spray-on leave-in conditioner that protects your hair and gives it a lasting shine.

Environmental conditions, daily styling, and natural wear and tear can suck the life out of your hair. Ghost Mist pumps that life right back in, with a blend of antioxidants and Vitamin E found in Argan Oil. It even provides natural UV protection!

Another way Ghost Mist protects your hair is by detangling it. Your system will be easy to maintain throughout the day, whether it’s human or synthetic. Ghost Mist Finishing Spray gives your hair a barrier against environmental damage—and your blow-dryer—and seals up your split ends to prevent further damage. It’s even safe for use with heat-styling tools.

Best of all? Ghost Mist brings on the shine! This stuff does more than just rejuvenate and protect! Spritz on this high-shine Finishing Spray, comb it through, and put on your shades on.

Ghost Mist Finishing Spray is your daily finishing touch. Try it out to shine, nourish and protect your hair with confidence!

title: GhostBond Classic
body_html:
You can never go wrong with an original and GHOSTBOND Water Resistant Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs stands the test of time. Our first high-performance adhesive contains no harsh chemicals, no toxic ingredients, and no latex so you can feel confident that you will get a superior hold that is safe and gentle to your skin. GHOSTBOND is designed to be impervious to water and skin oils which gives it a strong bond that will last up to four weeks through strenuous physical activity, high humidity, rainstorms, and daily showers.

  • GHOSTBOND Water Resistant Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs resists humidity, sweat, and water to provide a strong bond with your skin.
  • Specially designed for high temperatures and humidity, heavy perspiration and oily scalps to give a reliable bond regardless of the conditions.
  • The original GHOSTBOND Adhesive is a water-based copolymer that is formulated to give you four weeks of worry-free hold.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins and no latex so it is 100% safe for your skin.

GHOSTBOND Classic Water Resistant Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs resists humidity, sweat, and water to provide a strong bond with your skin.

   <p class="a-spacing-base">When it comes to finding the best hair bonding and wig glue, it’s important to use a cosmetic bonding solution that allows you to feel truly confident in any situation. Our GHOSTBOND Glowup Adhesive is specially formulated to provide exceptional moisture protection and has a higher melting point than other hair adhesive products to ensure comfort and hold strength at all times!</p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">Our GHOSTBOND Glowup hair replacement adhesive creates a strong, invisible bond between scalp and hairpiece to reduce movement, while hiding the hairline and absorbing light for a natural appearance. Our cosmetic formula can be used for both poly and front lace hairpieces and is ideal for those with oily skin and scalp, heavy perspiration and those who live in high humidity climates!</p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">Peace of mind when wearing a wig or toupee comes when you’re able to go about your day without worrying about your hair system moving or falling off. Our GHOSTBOND Glowup bonding glue is water and oil-resistance so that you can enjoy being in the moment instead of being focused on your hair.</p>
  </div>
 </div>

    <div class="apm-sidemodule-textright">
     <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">How To Apply GHOSTBOND Glowup Wig Glue</h3>
     <p>PLEASE NOTE: Patch test required each time before use.</p>
     <p></p>
     <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Section the hair away from the hairline.</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply a thin layer of GHOSTBOND Glowup directly to the scalp, focusing on the areas where the wig will adhere.</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Wait until the adhesive turns clear and repeat a second time.</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Wait for the adhesive to become tacky. This usually takes a few moments. Do not attach the wig while the adhesive is still wet.</span></li>
     </ul>
     <p></p>

 <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical a-spacing-mini">
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> PREMIUM HAIR REPLACEMENT GLUE: Our newest wig glue, GHOSTBOND Glowup is a top-quality wig adhesive formulated with our exclusive Advanced Adhesion Technology. This special formula ensures an ironclad grip when you need it and a gentle, peelable release when you don't. GHOSTBOND Glowup represents the pinnacle of wig adhesive technology, offering the perfect blend of strength, comfort, and confidence for a premium wig-wearing experience. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> INVISIBLE BONDING FOR NATURAL HAIR LOOKS: Our GHOSTBOND Glowup Adhesive works with both poly and lace hair replacement systems. Once you apply it, it creates an invisible bond that hides your hairline and makes your wig or hairpiece look totally natural. It's perfect for both boys and girls, men and women! Plus, our quick-drying and clear formula absorbs light and blends with your skin tone, making your hairline undetectable. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> EFFORTLESS APPLICATION & REMOVAL: Achieve a flawless wig application with ease, whether you're a beginner or a pro. GHOSTBOND Glowup offers a gentle and hassle-free peelable removal process, reducing the risk of damage to your natural hair and scalp. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> SAFE AND SKIN-FRIENDLY: GHOSTBOND Glowup is the perfect choice for wig enthusiasts of all skin types. Our special formula has been tested by dermatologists and is hypoallergenic, ensuring a safe and comfortable experience for everyone. Say goodbye to worries about skin sensitivity, and say hello to confident wig-wearing with GHOSTBOND Glowup! </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> ALL WEEK-LONG GLAM: Experience a week of unwavering confidence with GHOSTBOND Glowup! Our advanced Adhesion Technology ensures a strong and secure hold, making it perfect for short-term use up to one week. Say goodbye to daily adjustments and hello to a look that shines brightly. Embrace the freedom to live life boldly, one week at a time. </span></li>
 </ul>
 <div data-csa-c-content-id="voyager-product-details-jumplink" data-csa-c-slot-id="voyager-product-details-jumplink" data-csa-c-type="link" class="a-section aok-hidden">

   <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">LONG-TERM WEAR</h3>

   <p class="a-spacing-base">Our formula can handle more heat than other GHOSTBOND adhesives, giving you the confidence to go about your day without worrying about your hair system falling off from natural oils or wetness.</p>

     </noscript>
    </div>
    <div class="apm-sidemodule-textright">
     <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">How to Apply GHOSTBOND Platinum Wig Glue</h3>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Poly Systems:</span></p>
     <p></p>
     <ol class="a-ordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply one thin coating of GHOSTBOND Platinum to the hair system base and 4 thin coatings to the head. Apply each coat as soon as previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat wait 7 minutes and press hair system into place</span></li>
     </ol>
     <p></p>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Lace Systems:</span></p>
     <p></p>
     <ol class="a-ordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply 4 thin coatings of GHOSTBOND Platinum to scalp only DO NOT APPLY TO LACE BASE. Apply each coat as soon as previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat wait 7 minutes and press hair system into place.</span></li>
     </ol>
     <p></p>

 <h2 class="a-size-base-plus a-text-bold">About this item</h2>
 <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical a-spacing-mini">
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> SUPERIOR TEMPERATURE RESISTANCE: GHOSTBOND Platinum lace wig glue has the highest temperature resistance of any GHOSTBOND wig adhesives, making it the ideal choice for those who need the most durable hold even in high heat environments like saunas or beaches. Our formula also has a higher melting point than other polyurethane and lace front glue and hairpiece adhesives, enabling you to rest easy that your hair will remain in place. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> STRONGEST HOLD AMONG ALL GHOSTBOND ADHESIVES: GHOSTBOND Platinum wig glue provides the strongest hold that will keep your wig firmly in place all day long. It is specially formulated for use as a pressure sensitive adhesive and glue for bonding hair replacement systems to skin and scalp. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> ENJOY A SEAMLESS AND NATURAL LOOK: GHOSTBOND Platinum wig glue dries clear and leaves no residue. This lace wig adhesive creates an invisible bond after application for both poly and lace hair replacement systems. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> LESS PRODUCT APPLICATION REQUIRED: The GHOSTBOND Platinum hair glue is specially designed for those with oily skin and scalps, heavy perspiration and those in climates with high moisture and humidity. It requires less product compared to other GHOSTBOND adhesives, making it a cost-effective option for those who use the product frequently. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> VERSATILE, OIL AND WATER RESISTANT: Our GHOSTBOND Platinum hair glue for lace wigs is water-resistant and oil-resistant to help ensure your hair looks and feels as natural as possible. It is suitable for use with all types of wigs, including lace front wigs, full lace wigs, and synthetic wigs making it a versatile option for all wig wearers. </span></li>
 </ul>

title: GhostBond Signature Series Touch Up Adhesive Pen – 3ml
body_html:
GHOST BOND is finally available on the go! This easy-to-use adhesive pen works with a simple twist at the base of the pen. The adhesive is dispensed through the brush and can be applied to the areas of the scalp that commonly lift when you are not at home to fix your wig or unit.

PLEASE NOTE: PATCH TEST REQUIRED BEFORE USE

GHOST BOND is finally available on the go! This easy-to-use adhesive pen works with a simple twist at the base of the pen.

Weight 0.2 kg
Color

White
Gender

Unisex

title: GhostBond Silicone Applicator – 3 Pack
body_html:
This 3 Pack silicone applicator is specifically designed to ensure a smooth and accurate application of all GHOSTBOND and Professional Hair Labs water based adhesives. The smooth finish of the silicone ensures there are no ridges during the application process which assists with better hold during the curing period. This silicone applicator is easy to clean and reuse.

This 3 Pack silicone applicator is specifically designed to ensure a smooth and accurate application of all GHOSTBOND and Professional Hair Labs water based adhesives.

title: GhostBond Supreme
body_html:
GHOSTBOND Supreme by Pro Hair Labs is unique water-based copolymer wig adhesive that was designed by top chemists to give you a superior hold that no one will notice. We added superior holding power under the most adverse conditions such as heavy perspiration, oily skin, high temperatures and humidity. GHOSTBOND Supreme is formulated to dry clear and absorb light so your hairline is non-detectable. Our high-performance adhesive contains no harsh chemicals, no toxic ingredients, and no latex so it is safe and gentle on your skin. Works well with lace and polyurethane hair units.

  • GHOSTBOND Supreme by Pro Hair Labs is formulated for oily scalps, heavy perspiration, high temperatures and excessive humidity to keep the bond strong between your skin and hair.
  • GHOSTBOND Supreme dries quickly leaving a clear, matte finish that absorbs light so no one can see your hairline.
  • Works well with lace and polyurethane hair units.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins and no latex so it is 100% safe for your skin.

GHOSTBOND Supreme by Pro Hair Labs is unique water-based copolymer wig adhesive that was designed by top chemists to give you a superior hold that no one will notice.

     <p>Say goodbye to wig slips and hello to a fantastic hairline! GHOSTBOND Supreme is the best glue for lace front wigs. It holds your wig securely all day without any discomfort. Trust GHOSTBOND Supreme to keep your wig in place and make you feel confident at work or when you're having fun.</p>

    <div class="apm-sidemodule-textright">
     <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">How to Apply GHOSTBOND Supreme Wig Glue</h3>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Poly Systems:</span></p>
     <p>1. Apply one thin coating of PHL GHOSTBOND Supreme to the hair system base and 4 thin coatings to the head. Apply each coat as soon as previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</p>
     <p>2. After the 4th coat wait 7 minutes and press hair system into place.</p>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Lace Systems:</span></p>
     <p>1. Apply 4 thin coatings of pro hair labs GHOSTBOND Supreme to scalp only</p>
     <p>2. DO NOT APPLY TO LACE BASE. Apply each coat as soon as previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</p>
     <p>3. After the 4th coat wait 7 minutes and press hair system into place.</p>

 <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical a-spacing-mini">
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> NEVER WORRY ABOUT YOUR WIG SLIPPING OR SHIFTING AGAIN: GHOSTBOND Supreme lace wig glue, made from Ireland, is specially formulated for use as a pressure sensitive adhesive and glue for bonding hair replacement systems to skin and scalp. It provides a superior hold that keeps your wig firmly in place all day long. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> ENJOY A SEAMLESS AND NATURAL LOOK: GHOSTBOND Supreme wig glue dries clear and leaves no residue. This lace wig adhesive creates an invisible bond after application for both poly and lace hair replacement systems. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> VERSATILE, OIL AND WATER RESISTANT: Our GHOSTBOND Supreme hair glue for lace wigs is water-resistant and oil-resistant to help ensure your hair looks and feels as natural as possible. It is suitable for use with all types of wigs, including lace front wigs, full lace wigs, and synthetic wigs making it a versatile option for all wig wearers. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> COMFORTABLE AND SAFE FOR ALL-DAY WEAR: The GHOSTBOND Supreme wig glue is formulated with safe and non-toxic ingredients that are gentle on your skin and scalp. Its odorless formula ensures that you won't have to deal with any unpleasant smells or fumes while wearing your wig, making it a comfortable option for all-day wear. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> EASY TO APPLY AND REMOVE: GHOSTBOND Supreme lace glue is easy to remove without causing damage to your wig or natural hair. You'll love the convenience and ease of use that this supreme hair glue provides. </span></li>
 </ul>

title: GhostBond XL
body_html:
If you like our original GHOSTBOND Adhesive, you will love GHOSTBOND XL from Pro hair Labs. This new version is designed with enhanced waterproof capabilities and advanced moisture control to give you the best adhesive under high temperatures. GHOSTBOND XL has a higher melting point than other adhesives so it keeps a strong bond in high-temperature settings such as tropical locations, spas, and heated pool areas. Our high-performance adhesive contains no harsh chemicals, no toxic ingredients, and no latex so you can feel confident that you will get a superior hold that is safe and gentle to your skin.

  • GHOSTBOND XL Waterproof Adhesive with Extra Moisture Control by Pro Hair Labs is formulated for oily scalps, heavy perspiration, high temperatures and excessive humidity to keep the bond strong between your skin and hair.
  • Works well with lace and polyurethane hair units.
  • GHOSTBOND XL dries quickly leaving a clear, matte finish.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins and no latex so it is 100% safe for your skin.

GHOSTBOND XL Waterproof Adhesive with Extra Moisture Control by Pro Hair Labs is formulated for oily scalps, heavy perspiration, high temperatures and excessive humidity to keep the bond strong between your skin and hair.

Dimensions N/A

Unisex

     <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">How to Apply GHOSTBOND XL Wig Glue</h3>
     <p><span class="a-text-bold">For Poly Systems:</span></p>
     <p></p>
     <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply one thin coating of GHOSTBOND XL to the hair system base and 4 thin coatings to the head. Apply each coat as soon as the previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat, wait 7 minutes and press the hair system into place.</span></li>
     </ul>
     <p></p>

     <p></p>
     <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
      <li><span class="a-list-item">Apply 4 thin coatings of GHOSTBOND XL to the scalp only. DO NOT APPLY TO LACE BASE. Apply each coat as soon as the previous coat turns clear (approx. 20 seconds).</span></li>
      <li><span class="a-list-item">After the 4th coat wait 7 minutes and press hair system into place.</span></li>

 <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical a-spacing-mini">
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> LIGHT-HOLD HAIR REPLACEMENT GLUE: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive, Imported from Ireland, is made especially for keeping your hair replacement systems secure. It's like a special glue that gently sticks them to your skin and scalp. We've done lots of research and testing to make sure it's really good quality and safe to use. With our advanced adhesion technology, it provides maximum hold even in tough situations like excessive sweating, extreme moisture, and high temperatures." </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> INVISIBLE BONDING FOR NATURAL HAIR LOOKS: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive works with both poly and lace hair replacement systems. Once you apply it, it creates an invisible bond that hides your hairline and makes your wig or hairpiece look totally natural. It's perfect for both boys and girls, men and women! Plus, our quick-drying and clear formula absorbs light and blends with your skin tone, making your hairline undetectable. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> DESIGNED FOR OILY SCALPS, HIGH HUMIDITY & HEAVY PERSPIRATION: Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive is specially made for people with oily skin and scalps, or if you sweat a lot. It even works great in places with lots of moisture and humidity. It gives a strong hold, so you don't have to worry about your lace front wigs or toupees coming off. Our adhesive is suitable for oily skin, effectively masking yellow sebum excretion and protecting against skin oils or wetness. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> WATER AND OIL-RESISTANT: When you wear a wig or toupee, you want to feel confident and not worry about it moving or falling off. That's why our bonding glue is water resistant, so it won't come off if it gets wet. It's also resistant to natural skin oils, keeping your hair in place and looking and feeling natural. And the best part? Our adhesive is shower safe, so you can confidently step into the shower without worrying about your hair system losing its bond. </span></li>
  <li class="a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-list-item"> FREE OF LATEX, HARSH SOLVENTS, AND TOXIC INGREDIENTS: Our GHOSTBOND XL is designed with your sensitive skin and scalp in mind. We ensured it had no bad chemicals, latex, or toxic ingredients. Even when you remove your hairpiece, you can use a safe adhesive solvent like rubbing alcohol instead of other harsh things that might bother your skin. Our high-performance clear glue is manufactured to strict standards, ensuring 100% safety and no harsh chemicals. </span></li>
 </ul>

title: GhostBond XL Liquid Adhesive
body_html:
Professional Hair Lab's GhostBond XL Water-Based White Liquid Hair Systems Adhesive 1.3oz

When it comes to finding the best hair bonding and wig glue, it’s important to use a cosmetic bonding solution that allows you to feel truly confident in any situation.

Our GHOSTBOND XL Adhesive is specially formulated to provide exceptional moisture protection and has a higher melting point than other hair adhesive products to ensure comfort and hold strength at all times!

Our GHOSTBOND XL hair replacement adhesive creates a strong, invisible bond between scalp and hairpiece to reduce movement, while hiding the hairline and absorbing light for a natural appearance.

Our cosmetic formula can be used for both poly and front lace hairpieces and is ideal for those with oily skin and scalp, heavy perspiration and those who live in high humidity climates! Peace of mind when wearing a wig or toupee comes when you’re able to go about your day without worrying about your hair system moving or falling off.

Our GHOSTBOND XL bonding glue is waterproof and oil-resistance so that you can enjoy being in the moment, instead of being focused on your hair. The weather is bright and shiny outside. What a great day for a stroll in the park! Just one thing is stopping you: excessive sweating. When your hairpiece starts to absorb all the perspiration, it becomes very uncomfortable to wear. You constantly worry about it falling off or the wind blowing it away. No matter how strong your adhesive promises to be, you still panic over ending up in an embarrassing situation.

LIGHT HOLD HAIR REPLACEMENT GLUE, ADHESIVE

Our Ghost Bond XL Adhesive is specially formulated for use as a pressure sensitive adhesive and glue for bonding hair replacement systems to skin and scalp. Our products are researched, manufactured and rigorously tested to ensure high-quality, exceptional performance and safety.  

INVISIBLE BONDING FOR POLY LACE SYSTEMS

Ghost Bond XL Adhesive is safe for use on both poly and lace hair replacement systems and creates an invisible bond after application. This invisible bonding helps to hide your hairline and creates a natural look for your wig or toupee for both men and women alike.  

FORMULATED FOR OILY SCALPS, HIGH HUMIDITY HEAVY PERSPIRATION

Ghost Bond XL Adhesive by Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated for those with oily skin and scalps, heavy perspiration and those in climates with high moisture and humidity. Our formula also has a higher melting point than other polyurethane and lace front wig and toupee glues, enabling you to rest easy that your hair will remain in place.  

WATERPROOF OIL-RESISTANT

Peace of mind when wearing a wig or toupee comes when you’re able to go about your day without worrying about your hair system moving or falling off from natural skin oils or wetness. That’s why our cosmetic hair system bonding glue is waterproof and oil-resistant to help ensure your hair looks and feels as natural as possible!  

CONTAINS NO LATEX, HARSH SOLVENTS OR TOXIC INGREDIENTS

Our Ghost Bond XL is designed for those with sensitive skin and scalp, as our formula contains no nasty chemicals, no latex and no toxic ingredients. Also, when removing your hairpiece, using a skin-safe adhesive solvent – such as rubbing alcohol – may result in less skin and scalp irritation, as opposed to other harsh remedies.

That’s why our cosmetic hair system bonding glue is waterproof and oil-resistant to help ensure your hair looks and feels as natural as possible!  

CONTAINS NO LATEX, HARSH SOLVENTS OR TOXIC INGREDIENTS

Our Ghost Bond XL is designed for those with sensitive skin and scalp, as our formula contains no nasty chemicals, no latex and no toxic ingredients. Also, when removing your hairpiece, using a skin-safe adhesive solvent – such as rubbing alcohol – may result in less skin and scalp irritation, as opposed to other harsh remedies.

Feel confident and secure with Pro Hair Labs new GHOSTBOND Platinum hair replacement adhesive. This latest hair adhesive is specially formulated for high humidity, heavy perspiration, and oily scalps giving you the strongest hold possible for ultimate performance. GHOSTBOND Platinum adhesive is designed to withstand higher temperatures than other adhesives and is waterproof giving you a long, strong hold even in the toughest weather conditions. This new adhesive formula absorbs light, avoids reflection and requires less product to give you a great hold that no one else will notice. GHOSTBOND Platinum is free of harmful chemicals and is 100% safe for your skin.

title: Great White Adhesive
body_html:
Perfect for your sensitive-skin clients.

If you’re looking for a strong adhesive that is gentle on your sensitive-skin clients, then Great White is a perfect choice. It’s an Extended Wear liquid adhesive that is designed to a be used on clients with sensitive skin.

 Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Water
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Hold: 3-5 Weeks
  • Comparable: Ghost Bond™
  • Clear when dry
  • Waterproof
  • Nonflammable
  • Non-toxic
  • Non-stringy
  • Low Odor

Ingredients

Purified Water, Hydrophilic Acrylic Copolymer Resins (Latex-Free)

Directions:

  1. Prepare client’s scalp with 99% Alcohol.
  2. Use sponge brushes to apply a thin, even coat of GREAT WHITE to scalp
  3. Blow dry until clear.
  4. Repeat once more, then press hair system onto scalp, firmly holding for 10 seconds.
  5. Remind client to wait 24 hours before swimming, shampooing, or working out.

Cautions

  • Close cap tightly.
  • Do not breathe fumes.
  • Store below 90°F Test on small area before use.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • External use only.
  • Avoid eye contact.

Available Sizes

  • Brush-On 3.4 oz

title: Hybrid Edge Lace (V-Front) | Hybrid French Lace Hair System with Skin Perimeters and Lace Front | V-Shaped Front Hairline
body_html:
Lace and Skin Hair System with V-Shaped Front Hairline

Lace and Skin Hair System with V-Shaped Front Hairline: The Ultimate in Natural Look and Comfort Unlock the perfect blend of comfort and authenticity with our French Lace and Skin Hair System, featuring a distinctive V-shaped front hairline. This innovative design integrates French lace in the central region and skin polyurethane at the edges and the frontal hairline. The V-shaped front captures the subtle nuances of a slightly receded hairline, offering a realistic look that resonates with many users. One of the standout features of this hairpiece is its seamless front line, achieved through meticulously knotted lace. The hybrid design combines the breathability of lace and the robust, long-lasting bond of polyurethane. This unique composition offers an array of bonding options, from liquid adhesives to tapes, giving you the freedom to choose the method that best fits your lifestyle. While this model showcases the benefits of a dual-base system, it's essential to note that it complements our range of all-lace and all-skin hair systems. Each design in our collection serves different needs and lifestyles, empowering you to find your ideal match. Key Features: Base Material: Expertly crafted from French lace at the top and front, reinforced by 0.06 mm polyurethane all around. Features a natural-looking V-shaped hairline. Default Size: Available in multiple base sizes for a tailored fit. Hair Grade: Comprised of luxurious A-Grade Indian Hair. Density: A medium-light density of 90-110% offers a natural yet full look. Wave/Curl: Designed with a standard body wave, perfect for versatile styling. Lifespan: Durably constructed for a lifespan of 4 to 6 months with proper care. Choose our Lace and Skin Hair System with a V-Shaped Front Hairline for an undetectable, comfortable, and personalized hair replacement experience. 💡 Why Choose This Hair System? - Ultra-thin, natural-looking base for seamless blending - Lightweight and breathable for all-day comfort - Designed for durability with proper maintenance - Ideal for achieving a natural hairline with a secure fit 🛒 Order now and enjoy a confidence-boosting, natural look!

Key Features:

  • Base Material: High-quality polyurethane
  • Default Size: Standard dimensions available
  • Hair Quality: Premium Indian Remy hair
  • Density: Medium-light for a natural look
  • Wave/Curl Pattern: Standard body wave
  • Lifespan: 3-6 months with proper care

Designed for comfort, durability, and a seamless natural appearance.

body_html:
The most aggressive Toupee and Wig tape on the market. Known for its dull finish, this tape makes it practically unnoticeable through mesh units. Hyper Hold’s long-lasting bond, stretchy, and flexible qualities make it a superb choice for customers that prefer a low maintenance tape. This tape leaves a heavy residue, but with reapplications occurring only once a month, the long clean up time is understood by customers.

Step 1: Peel the scored line on strips and contours
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply to your client's scalp.

 

All contours come in packs of 36 except Bulk Bags which comes in a pack of 1,000.

title: Just-rite Positioning Spray
body_html:
Just-Rite Positioning Spray is a great product to have on hand for stylists, whether they’re new or experienced. When sprayed on the adhesive area, it temporarily suspends the hold of the adhesive. This gives a bit of flexibility so that the system can be positioned exactly right.

Specs

  • Systems: All
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • A safeguard against slight mistakes
  • Quick to evaporate without affecting hold times

Ingredients

Isopropyl Alcohol, Ethyl Alcohol, Glicerin, Carbomer, Amynomethil Propanol, Propylene Glycol, Isopropyl Myristate, Tocophryl Acetate, Fragrance

Directions:

  1. After glue/tape has been applied to unit or scalp, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area.
  2. The amount sprayed will determine the amount of time available to adjust the unit.
  3. Place the unit onto the scalp and move into place.
  4. Can also be used as a touch-up product.

Cautions

  • Store below 90°F.
  • Test on small area before use.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • External use only.
  • Avoid eye contact.
  • Tighten cap promptly after use.
  • Do not apply to severely irritated skin.
  • Flammable.
  • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
  • Professional Use Only.

SDS Sheet (PDF)

Available Sizes

  • Spray 4 oz

title: Lace Front Adhesive Tape Strips
body_html:
Among all the tapes on the market, LuxHair Lace Front Adhesive Tape is the one that offers the longest durability, being resistant to sweat and high temperatures, allowing the prosthesis user to perform any sports activity in a totally safe way. In addition, it is hypoallergenic, does not degrade, and is easy to clean.

 

All the benefits of LuxHair's Lace Front tapes, such as high durability and strength, now available in 3, 10, and 30-meter rolls.


Advantages

  • Extra strong hold for 3 weeks.
  • Transparent.
  • Resistant to water and sweat.
  • Cut to size as desired.
  • Specific formulation for hair bonding: hair prosthesis, wigs, and extensions.

 

Format

Each bag contains 36 tapes.

Size of each tape: 8,5 x 2 cm.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Remove the paper from one side and glue it on the scalp at the desired attachment points. At the edges, placing the tape 2 millimeters behind the reference line is recommended.
  • Once placed on the scalp, remove the paper from the other side of the adhesive to glue the hair system.
  • For backcombed toupees, where an ultra-realistic hairline is desired, liquid adhesive is highly recommended.

title: Lace Front Support Tape Contour Strips
body_html:
Walker Tape's Lace Front Adhesive Hair Systems Contour Tape

Lace Front Contour Tape

Lace Front Support Contour Tape Strips (Blue Liner tape) is by far our most popular hair system tape. With its dull finish and an amazing 2-4 week hold everyone who uses it – loves it. If you havent tried it we highly recommend it!

Lace Front Support Contour Tapes have all the great hold and finish of Lace Front Support Tape roll in easy to use CC and C Contour shapes

The dull finish makes it perfect for lace front systems as it reduces the effect of shine sometimes visible at the front edge of the unit.

We recommend Lace Front Support Contour Tapes C to ensure a great hold and long time wear during active/busy days on set. Lace Front Support Contour tapes are perfect for all types of lace units.

Lace Front Support tape is one of our top sellers. It’s famous for it’s dull finish and strong hold. It is odorless and bacteria resistant. It lifts easily, minimizing damage to delicate lace systems. The liner is blue but the actual tape is clear.

HOLD
Maximum wear (2-4+ weeks) tapes are the longest lasting tapes we make. Depending on temperature, humidity, and body oils, they can last up to six weeks. Because they’re usually the most tacky, they require more skill to apply.

Available in packs of 36 pcs. 

Lace Front Support Tape manufacturer: Walker Tape – the leader in Hair Replacement Supplies

title: Lace Front Support Tape Rolls
body_html:
A Maximum Wear favorite, famous for its dullness and reliable hold.

Specs

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Dull (great for lace)

  • Residue: Medium
  • Liner: Blue (tape is clear)

title: Lace Release Adhesive Remover Spray
body_html:
LuxHair's Lace Release Adhesive Remover is a hair solvent that assists in removing hair replacement systems such as hairpieces, lace wigs, or adhesive hair extensions. This cleaner temporarily deactivates the adhesive, caring for the base and hair, which extends the life of lace systems.

 

Advantages

  • Lace Release deactivates hair adhesive temporarily with a non-aggressive formula, extending the lifetime of your hair system.
  • This product is not recommended for eliminating adhesive residues that will remain in your hair system and on the scalp after hairpiece removal.
  • For the complete removal of adhesive residues, it is highly recommended to use LuxHair's C22 solvent spray.
  • Specific formulation for cleaning hair prostheses, wigs, and extensions.

 

Active Ingredients

It contains Panthenol.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Open the hair in sections and generously apply the product to the areas where the adhesive or tapes are located.
  • After approximately one minute from the moment the liquid comes into contact with the adhesives, the adhesives will be deactivated, allowing the base of your system to peel off.
  • Removal of the Lace system should be done carefully without pulling so that the residue remains on the scalp rather than on the hairpiece, reducing cleaning time considerably.
  • After removal of the hairpiece, remove any remaining glue residue from the hair system and scalp with LuxHair's C22 solvent spray.

Product safety data sheet

title: Lace Release Spray
body_html:
Walker Tape's Lace Release: The Ideal Adhesive Remover for Hair Systems

Effortlessly remove adhesive from the hair system base material with Walker Tape's Lace Release Spray. This fast-acting formula works to keep the adhesive on the scalp, minimizing stress on the hair system's base and extending its lifespan.

Unlike other adhesive removers, Lace Release is specifically formulated to be gentle yet effective, making it perfect for fragile hair systems that require extra care during removal.

Features and Benefits

    • Optimized for mesh-based lace hair systems

    • Alcohol-based formula

    • Gentle and skin-safe

    • Slow to breakdown, ensuring effective removal

    • Leaves no residue

    • No cleanup needed post-application

    • Light alcohol fragrance

  • Fast-acting for quick removal

Ingredients

Medical Grade Dimethyl carbinol, Mineral Oil, Propylene Glycol, FD&C B1

Directions

Apply Lace Release to the system, directing it toward the scalp. Wait 30 seconds and reapply. Gently lift the hair system from the scalp, taking care to avoid eye contact with the product.

Cautions

    • Seal cap tightly after use

    • Do not apply to irritated or broken skin

    • Limit skin contact to 30-45 minutes

    • Avoid inhaling fumes

    • For external use only

    • Avoid contact with eyes

    • Keep out of children's reach

    • Conduct a patch test before full application

    • Store away from heat and open flames

  • Optimal storage temperature below 90°F

Available Sizes

    • Dab-On 1.4 oz

    • Spray 4 oz

  • Quart (32 oz)

title: LuxHair Smart Hold Tape Strips
body_html:
Las cintas adhesivas LuxHair Smart Hold suponen un nuevo estándar de calidad, adherencia, durabilidad y cuidado del cuero cabelludo.
Además, es la cinta adhesiva más equilibrada del mercado, ya que ofrece una duración de hasta 4 semanas sin ser muy agresiva (al contrario que otras cintas de gran duración), por lo que difícilmente causa alergias y es fácil de limpiar.

 

Beneficios
  • Indicada para el 90% de los usuarios que realizan los mantenimientos de sus sistemas capilares entre 1 y 4 semanas.
  • El adhesivo presente en las cintas Smart Hold es de baja agresividad, maximizando su flexibilidad y su facilidad de limpieza.
  • Disponibles en diferentes contornos: Rectas, LF y CC.
Recomendaciones de uso
  • Retirar el papel de las caras y pegar sobre el curto cabelludo en los puntos de fijación deseados. En los bordes, se recomienda colocar las cintas 2mm por detrás de la línea a pegar.
  • Una vez colocadas las cintas en el cuero cabelludo, eliminar el papel protector de la cara superior y adherir el sistema capilar.
  • Para frontales peinados hacia atrás, se recomienda usar adhesivo líquido para maximizar la indetectabilidad.

title: Medical 1522 Contour Adhesive Tape Strips
body_html:
Are you suffering from an allergy, or have you ever suffered from a hair allergy due to the incorrect placement of your hair prosthesis?

LuxHair wants to offer you the peace of mind of continuing to use your prosthesis normally and safely, even if you have an allergy, without having to give up your hair and still feel safe.

The 1522 tape is an old acquaintance of the industry that LuxHair brings to the market in a renewed format. This new tape is characterized by its gentleness on the scalp and easy cleaning. Being a harmless tape, it will never cause a skin reaction, even on users with the most sensitive skin, making this tape a great hypoallergenic option.

 

Advantages

  • Extra safe hold for up to 2 days
  • Recommended for users who maintain their prosthesis daily or every few days.
  • It contains the least aggressive adhesive on the market, which makes them very easy to remove.
  • Transparent color, undetectable.
  • Available in different contours: straight, LF, and CC.
  • Specific formulation for hair adhesion in prostheses, wigs, and extensions.

 

Format

Each bag contains 36 tapes.

Size of each tape: 8,5 x 2 cm.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Remove the paper from one side and glue it on the scalp at the desired attachment points. At the edges, placing the tape 2 millimeters behind the reference line is recommended.
  • Once placed on the scalp, remove the paper from the other side of the adhesive to glue the hair system.
  • For backcombed toupees, where an ultra-realistic hairline is desired, liquid adhesive is highly recommended.

title: New Demension Wig Adhesive - Invisible, Water & Oil-Resistant, & Strong Hold Hair Bonding Replacement Glue for Poly and Lace Hairpieces, 1.3oz
body_html:
Introducing the New Dimension Wig Adhesive, a groundbreaking product from Professional Hair Labs designed to revolutionize your hairpiece experience. This adhesive is the key to a confident day, regardless of your activities. Developed with Advanced Adhesion technology, it offers unmatched holding power, ensuring that your wig or hairpiece stays securely in place from morning to night. Perfect for anyone who values reliability in their hair system, New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple promises a stronghold that withstands sweat, humidity, and the elements, letting you live your life to the fullest without a second thought about your hair.

At the heart of New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple is its commitment to natural appearance and skin health. Its superior formula is not only strong but also invisible, drying clear to maintain the natural look of your hairline and blend seamlessly with your scalp. Formulated to be gentle on the skin, it is free from harsh chemicals, latex, and toxic ingredients, making it ideal for users with sensitive skin. This adhesive is the perfect choice for those who demand both high performance and safety, offering peace of mind and a comfortable fit for all-day wear.

Ease of use is a cornerstone of the New Dimension Wig Adhesive experience. Whether you are a seasoned wig wearer or new to hairpieces, you will appreciate how effortlessly this adhesive can be applied and removed, ensuring a hassle-free routine. It is compatible with a wide range of hair systems, including lace fronts, toupees, and poly units, making it a versatile option for anyone looking to secure their hairpiece with confidence. Experience a secure, natural-looking hair system with New Dimension Wig Adhesive that allows you to embrace every moment with confidence.

  • STRONG HOLD FOR ACTIVE LIFESTYLES: New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple is specially crafted to keep your hairpieces securely attached, even during active days filled with movement and sweat. Our adhesive is rigorously tested to ensure top-notch quality and safety, offering unbeatable hold under various conditions including high temperatures and humidity. Whether you're running errands or enjoying an outdoor adventure, trust our adhesive to maintain your hair's flawless appearance.
  • INVISIBLE BONDING FOR NATURAL HAIR LOOKS: Achieve a natural hairline with New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple, designed to work with both lace and poly hair systems. This adhesive dries clear and fast, merging seamlessly with your skin tone to make your hairpiece undetectable. It's the ideal choice for anyone wanting to enhance their look discreetly, ensuring your wig or toupee blends perfectly with your natural hair for both men and women.
  • IDEAL FOR OILY SKIN AND SWEATY CONDITIONS: Formulated for individuals with oily skin or those prone to sweating, New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple ensures your hairpiece stays firmly in place, no matter the climate. It's specifically engineered to combat the challenges of high humidity and perspiration, offering a strong bond that resists slippage, making it perfect for keeping your style intact throughout the day.
  • WATERPROOF AND OIL-RESISTANT ADHESION: With New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple, say goodbye to worries about your wig or toupee shifting. Our waterproof formula ensures your hair system remains secure even when wet, making it shower-safe and resistant to natural skin oils. This adhesive provides peace of mind, knowing your hair will stay as intended, looking natural and feeling secure, no matter the circumstances.
  • FREE OF LATEX, HARSH SOLVENTS, AND TOXIC INGREDIENTS: Prioritizing your skin's health, New Dimension Wig Adhesive Purple is free from latex, harsh solvents, and toxic ingredients. It's designed for sensitive skin, ensuring a safe application and removal process. For removal, a gentle adhesive solvent like rubbing alcohol is recommended, avoiding harsh chemicals. Our commitment to safety and quality makes it the go-to adhesive for a secure, comfortable fit without compromising on skin health.

title: New Demensions
body_html:
Are you looking for an adhesive that withstands the toughest conditions? Try New Demension Extended Wear Bond by Pro Hair Labs and feel confident that your appearance will stay intact through any situation. Our new extended wear bond was developed by a team of expert chemists who specialize in surgical adhesives so it is a robust, water-based copolymer hair adhesive that is designed to be as strong as you. New Demension Extended Wear Bond is non-toxic and has anti-fungal properties to keep your skin healthy and happy. New Demension bond is white when you apply it and dries clear. Works well on lace and polyurethane hair systems.

  • New Demension Extended Wear Bond by Pro Hair Labs is a strong, water-based copolymer hair adhesive that is designed to withstand the toughest conditions.
  • Works great on lace and polyurethane hair systems.
  • Special formula provides a strong bond, yet is gentle to your skin.
  • No harsh chemical means it is 100% safe for your skin. Non-toxic. Anti-fungal.

New Demension Extended Wear Bond is non-toxic and has anti-fungal properties to keep your skin healthy and happy. New Demension bond is white when you apply it and dries clear. Works well on lace and polyurethane hair systems.

title: New Demensions Dual Action
body_html:
Leave your scalp in great condition with New Demension Dual Action Shampoo by Pro Hair Labs. This revolutionary shampoo is designed for use after you remove your hair replacement unit to cleanse your skin of adhesive residue and skin oils that may interfere with your next application. This shampoo incorporates natural antibacterial and anti-fungal properties to keep your skin healthy, refreshed and ready for the next adhesive application and eliminating the need for a separate antifungal spray. Wash scalp and hair replacement unit to remove excess adhesive, dirt and skin oils. Because New Demension Dual Action Shampoo is ultra-hydrating, the hair unit may feel slightly oily. If this occurs, wash the hair unit in PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo.

  • Professional-grade shampoo is tough enough for hair salons but gentle enough for daily home use.
  • New Demension Dual Action Shampoo is specifically designed to remove adhesive residue from your scalp and hair system.
  • The innovative shampoo has antibacterial and antifungal properties which help to control scalp itch and oil and eliminate the need for a separate anti-fungal spray.
  • No harsh chemical means it is 100% safe.

New Demension Dual Action Shampoo is specifically designed to remove adhesive residue from your scalp and hair system.

title: No Glue Contour Tape Strips
body_html:
A more aggressive and longer-lasting Toupee and Wig tape than 1522. You'll get up to 14 days of strong consistent hold with minimal residue. This is a versatile Toupee and Wig tape that our clients fall in love with and have come to count on for its reliability. Its’ dull shine and matte finish make this one of our most popular tapes. 

  • Base: Lace
  • Shine: Dull
  • Hold: Extended Wear (2-4 weeks)
  • Residue: Low
  • Comparable: Vapon's TopStick Plus®

Directions: 

Step 1: Peel the scored line on strips and contours
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply it to your client's scalp.

 

All contours come in packs of 36, except for 6" A Curve which comes in a pack of 24, and Bulk Bags which comes in a pack of 1,000.

title: No Shine Tape Minis Strips Pack
body_html:
Walker Tape's No-Shine Tape Minis Adhesive Tape for Hair Systems, Lace Wigs and Toupees

No-Shine Adhesive Tape Minis 72 pcs

No Shine Tape is a hypoallergenic extended wear tape. As the name suggests it has an extremely dull finish and is virtually invisible through the unit reducing the effect of shine sometimes visible at the front edge of the unit. This tape has an extremely strong bond, which can last for up to 3-4 weeks.

Pack of 72 tabs Minis.

Well known for having an extremely dull finish Walker Tape No Shine Tape is virtually invisible through the Hair Piece reducing the effect of shine sometimes visible at the front edge of the Hair Piece. The new Mini format allows for easier placement and application and are ideal for emergencies and touch-ups.

No Shine Tape has an extremely strong bond, which can last for up to 4 weeks.

Walker No Shine Tape Minis are made with Urethane, which makes the tape flexible with the skin.

Depending on the temperature, humidity, and body oils No Shine Mini Strips can last up to 4 weeks. Usually the stickiest, they require more skill to apply.

Walker No-Shine Tape Minis Manufacturer: Walker Tape – The leader in Hair Replacement Supplies

What are No-Shine Tape Minis for:

Hair System application, Hair Loss in Women, Hair Loss in Men, Hair Systems, Hair Loss Products and Treatments, Lace Wigs, Toupee and Accessories.

Also known as No-Shine.

 

No-Shine is a leader in maximum wear. It has a very dull finish and is virtually invisible through the unit. It’s made with urethane which makes it very flexible with the skin. We offer this tape in 1.5″ width rolls so it’s perfect for full-coverage jobs. It’s also easy to clean and doesn’t break down as much as other tapes during removal. It’s great for use with any unit. The liner is white but the actual tape is clear.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Dull (Great for Lace)
  • Gentleness: Hypoallergenic
  • Residue: High
  • Liner: Printed White (tape is clear)
  • Thickness: 10mil
  • Carrier: Stretchy
  • Maximum Wear: 2-4+ Weeks
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use
  • Professional Use Only

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 10 mil

Directions:

  1. Peel the scored liner off
  2. The adhesive side is placed towards unit. Avoid touching adhesive
  3. Place the tab where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, remove tabs
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • Rolls: 3yd, 12yd, 36yd
  • Contours: A, AA, B, BB, C, CC
  • Straight Strips: 1/2″ x 3″, 3/4″ x 3″, 1″ x 3″
  • Minis

title: No Sweat
body_html:
No Sweat Scalp Antiperspirant by Pro Hair Labs is designed specifically to help ensure that you get a good bond during each application of your chosen wig adhesive. Apply No Sweat antiperspirant on a clean scalp and allow to dry before applying your adhesive. The special ingredients in No Sweat will control skin oils while you apply your adhesive ensuring that you get an effective bond. No Sweat Scalp Antiperspirant contains no harsh chemicals and no toxic ingredients so you can feel confident that you will get a superior hold that is safe and gentle to your skin.

  • No Sweat Scalp Antiperspirant by Pro Hair Labs is designed specifically for to control scalp oil while you apply wig adhesive.
  • Allows you to apply your wig adhesive without fear of interference that causes the adhesive to cure improperly.
  • No Sweat Scalp Antiperspirant works well with any adhesive and is easy to apply to the skin.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins and no latex so it is 100% safe for your skin.

No Sweat Scalp Antiperspirant by Pro Hair Labs is designed specifically for to control scalp oil while you apply wig adhesive.

title: No-shine Tape Rolls
body_html:
No-Shine is a leader in maximum wear. It has a very dull finish and is virtually invisible through the unit. It’s made with urethane which makes it very flexible with the skin. We offer this tape in 1.5″ width rolls so it’s perfect for full-coverage jobs. It’s also easy to clean and doesn’t break down as much as other tapes during removal. It’s great for use with any unit. The liner is white but the actual tape is clear.

Specs

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Dull (Great for Lace)
  • Gentleness: Hypoallergenic
  • Residue: High
  • Liner: Printed White (tape is clear)
  • Thickness: 10mil
  • Carrier: Stretchy
  • Maximum Wear: 2-4+ Weeks
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use
  • Professional Use Only

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 10 mil

Directions:

  1. Peel the tape from the roll and cut the desired length.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive
  3. Place the piece where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining liner pieces
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • Rolls: 3yd, 12yd, 36yd
  • Contours: A, AA, B, BB, C, CC
  • Straight Strips: 1/2″ x 3″, 3/4″ x 3″, 1″ x 3″
  • Minis

Education

Blogs

  • Acrylic Tapes & Liquid Adhesives for Hair Systems
  • Products Every Salon Needs Going Forward
  • Tapes Overview

Videos

title: No-shine Tape Straight Strips
body_html:
No-Shine is a leader in maximum wear. It has a very dull finish and is virtually invisible through the unit. It’s made with urethane which makes it very flexible with the skin. We offer this tape in 1.5″ width rolls so it’s perfect for full-coverage jobs. It’s also easy to clean and doesn’t break down as much as other tapes during removal. It’s great for use with any unit. The liner is white but the actual tape is clear.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Dull (Great for Lace)
  • Gentleness: Hypoallergenic
  • Residue: High
  • Liner: Printed White (tape is clear)
  • Thickness: 10mil
  • Carrier: Stretchy
  • Maximum Wear: 2-4+ Weeks
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use
  • Professional Use Only

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 10 mil

Directions:

  1. Peel the scored liner off
  2. The adhesive side is placed towards unit. Avoid touching adhesive
  3. Place the tab where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, remove tabs
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • Rolls: 3yd, 12yd, 36yd
  • Contours: A, AA, B, BB, C, CC
  • Straight Strips: 1/2″ x 3″, 3/4″ x 3″, 1″ x 3″
  • Minis

title: Phantom
body_html:
Like a ghost in the night, Phantom hair adhesive might be glimpsed at first but will soon disappear. Suitable a both a poly and lace wig adhesive, this is the most stealthy cosmetic bonding solution you will ever encounter. Even under the thinnest of bases, Phantom hair adhesive will remain undetected, and yet, despite its fading appearance, will give you a rock solid hold and the confidence you need.

Formulated under the auspices of a team of chemists who develop surgical adhesives. Professional Hair Labs always puts safety first. Phantom hair adhesive contains no latex, no harsh solvents or any of the irritants frequently found in cheaper formulations. It has been specially formulated for oily scalps, high humidity, and heavy perspiration.

Like a ghost in the night, Phantom hair adhesive might be glimpsed at first but will soon disappear. Suitable a both a poly and lace wig adhesive, this is the most stealthy cosmetic bonding solution you will ever encounter.
