title: PHL #5
body_html:
Your hair replacement unit will look fresh and fabulous with the PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo by Pro Hair Labs. Specially designed for use on hair replacement units, use our clarifying shampoo after the New Demension Dual Action Shampoo to remove every trace of adhesive and styling products such as hair spray, gels, and pomades. This unique shampoo has a clean, crisp scent and restores hair to its original soft, supple and shiny state. PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo is also great on your scalp and will remove any residue left from your adhesive or other cleansers. For best results use the PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo in conjunction with Pro Hair Labs Dermal Mud for healthy, glowing skin that is free of toxins and harsh chemicals. Works great on lace and polyurethane base systems.

  • PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo by Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated to keep your hair replacement unit looking great for years by easily removing all traces of adhesives and styling products.
  • The professional-grade shampoo is gentle enough for everyday use on skin and hair replacement units. Regular use in conjunction with New Demension Dual Action Shampoo and Dermal Mud will leave clean skin and hair for effective adhesion during your next application.
  • Clean, the crisp scent makes hair and skin care a pleasure.
  • No harsh chemical means it is 100% safe and toxin-free, leaving your skin and hair clean and healthy. Simply wash your scalp and hair replacement unit with the clarifying shampoo allowing it to penetrate deep into the skin and hair for approximately one to two minutes before rinsing.

PHL 5 Clarifying Shampoo by Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated to keep your hair replacement unit looking great for years by easily removing all traces of adhesives and styling products

title: Premier Lace Elite | French Lace Hair System with Premium Remy Indian Hair
body_html:
Premium Full Lace Hair System with Remy Indian Hair Discover unparalleled comfort and realism with our Premium Full Lace Hair System, featuring the luxurious touch of Remy Indian Hair. Constructed with high-grade, ultralight mesh lace material, this hairpiece is not only breathable but also highly discreet, offering an undetectable and natural-looking hairline. Specially designed for both first-time users and those leading active lifestyles, this full lace hair system is an excellent choice for those seeking an effortless, natural appearance. Its lightweight base requires minimal adhesive, providing a secure bond to the scalp while also reducing the need for heavy products. However, it's important to note that the delicate nature of the lace material necessitates more frequent maintenance and retouches, ensuring you keep your look fresh and vibrant. Key Features

title: Pro Series Conditioner for Shiny, Smooth, Strong, Frizz-free & Bouncy Healthy Hair - Daily Use Hair Care Color Treatment w/Argan Oil, Aloe Vera & Cucumber for Lace Wig, Toupee & Hairpieces, 8oz
body_html:
Introducing Pro Series Conditioner for Lace Wigs, Toupees, and Hairpieces – Your Secret to Amazing Hair Every Day!

Our special conditioner is like a gentle potion for your hair. It's designed to make your hair feel super soft and strong. You won't have to worry about those little stray hairs anymore. And guess what? It works for all kinds of hair, including your wig or hairpiece.

Imagine having hair that feels light as a feather, not heavy or greasy. This conditioner is like a breath of fresh air for your hairpieces. It doesn't leave any weird stuff behind, like those big words "sulfates," "phosphates," or "parabens." Instead, it keeps your hairpieces looking bouncy and feeling super fine..

No more boring, dull hair! Our special conditioner is like a refreshing drink for your hair strands. It's made without any bad stuff that can harm your hairpieces. Instead, we packed it with natural stuff like Aloe, Cucumber, and Rosemary, plus lots of vitamins. That means it helps your hairpieces stay strong and lively without making them all oily or messy..

This conditioner is like a shield for your hairpieces. It's made for everyday use, just like brushing your teeth. It fixes up damaged hair and keeps it strong and healthy. We even added something called "Argan Oil" that's like a superhero for your hair. It fights off bad stuff and makes your hair pieces shiny and strong.

We care about your hairpieces, so we made this conditioner without any bad stuff. It's free from things that can harm your hair, like those big words "sulfates" and "parabens." You can use it every day, and it will keep your hairpieces safe from getting tired and worn out.

With Pro Series Conditioner, your hairpieces will look their best every day. It's like giving them a spa day, and they'll thank you with shiny, healthy hair!

  • AMAZING HAIR TRANSFORMATION: Pro Series Conditioner, made in Ireland, makes your lace wigs, toupees, and hair systems smooth, strong, and shiny, and it even tames those pesky flyaways. Whether you have curly, straight, or wavy hair, it works perfectly for you.
  • BOUNCY AND BEAUTIFUL HAIR: Enjoy having hair that's light and clean, not heavy or greasy. Your hair systems will stay bouncy and feel soft, keeping them strong and healthy for a long time.
  • HELLO, HEALTHY HAIR: Say goodbye to dry and dull hair! Our Pro Series conditioner is like a refreshing drink for your hair strands. It’s packed with natural extracts like Aloe, Cucumber, Rosemary, and a protein blend of vitamins. This means it helps your hairpieces stay strong, vibrant, and lively without making them all oily or messed up.
  • PRO-LEVEL PROTECTION: Pro Series Conditioner is your hair’s shield against everyday wear and tear. With its special ingredient, Argan Oil, it restores, strengthens and nourishes damaged hair.
  • SAFE AND GENTLE: No need to worry about harsh stuff. Our conditioner is made with ingredients that are really gentle on your hair. It's free from substances that can harm your hair, like sulfates, parabens, and other chemicals ensuring they stay healthy and strong. Invest in long-lasting healthy hair with Pro Series Conditioner.

title: Pro Series Daily Care Shampoo & Conditioner Set | Sulfate-Free, Moisturizing, Anti-Frizz, Color-Safe for Wigs & Hair Systems - 8 Fl Oz each
body_html:
Hydrate, protect, and add shine to lace wigs and hair systems daily with Pro Series sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner, formulated to prevent dryness, reduce frizz, and maintain color vibrancy.

  • COMPLETE DAILY CARE FOR WIGS & HAIR SYSTEMS The Pro Series Shampoo & Conditioner Combo offers a gentle, sulfate-free solution tailored for wigs, toupees, and hair systems. This daily care duo, made in Ireland, keeps hair soft, vibrant, and frizz-free, ensuring a fresh, manageable look without damage.
  • NATURAL INGREDIENTS FOR NOURISHING CLEANSE Our shampoo is enriched with Aloe, Argan, Panthenol, and Rosemary extracts, gently cleansing hair systems to remove buildup and oil while leaving hair refreshed. The conditioner hydrates with Aloe Vera, Cucumber, and Argan Oil, enhancing shine and softness.
  • ANTI-FRIZZ, MOISTURIZING FORMULA FOR HEALTHY HAIR Say goodbye to dryness and hello to shine! This combo protects color vibrancy and prevents frizz, restoring moisture and elasticity to keep hair looking bouncy and healthy.
  • REVITALIZES AND STRENGTHENS HAIR SYSTEMS The protein-rich formula with hydrolyzed proteins repairs damaged hair, reduces breakage, and strengthens hair systems. It’s ideal for maintaining the beauty of lace wigs, toupees, and hairpieces.
  • SAFE FOR YOU & THE PLANET Crafted with eco-friendly ingredients, this combo is free from sulfates, parabens, and harsh chemicals. Enjoy vibrant, healthy hair with cruelty-free formulas that care for your hair and the environment.

   <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">Say Yes to Vibrant, Soft, and Naturally Beautiful Hair with Pro Series Shampoo!</h3>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">Imagine your hair being a vibrant work of art, soft to the touch, and naturally beautiful. That's the magic of Pro Series Shampoo. It's like a gentle fairy tale for your hair, with natural ingredients that protect your hair's color and give it a big drink of moisture.</p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">Say goodbye to dry and dull hair days, and hello to hair that shines with vibrant colors and feels as soft as a cloud. Pro Series Shampoo makes your hair feel like a dream come true. Let your hair's natural beauty shine through!</p>

 <div class="celwidget aplus-module 3p-module-b aplus-standard" cel_widget_id="aplus-3p-module-b">
  <div class="aplus-module-wrapper aplus-3p-fixed-width">
   <h3 class="a-spacing-mini">From Nature with Love: Pro Series Shampoo's Gentle Cleaning Bliss</h3>
<img alt="effective cleansing natural ingredients thinning treated herbal hard silicone hold toupee piece" class="a-spacing-base a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/19b48584-0762-46a5-896e-6669ab8e37d8.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.png" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/19b48584-0762-46a5-896e-6669ab8e37d8.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.png">

   </noscript>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">Experience the wonders of nature with Pro Series Shampoo. We've packed this bottle with the goodness of Aloe vera, Argan Oil, and Rosemary, each offering its own unique charm to your hair:</p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base"></p>
   <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">
    <li><span class="a-list-item">Aloe vera: This natural hero soothes your scalp, saying goodbye to that itchiness, and helps your hair retain moisture, keeping it soft and manageable.</span></li>
    <li><span class="a-list-item">Argan Oil: It's like a drink of water for your hair. Argan Oil hydrates every strand, bringing back life to even the driest locks. Hello, shine, and strength!</span></li>
    <li><span class="a-list-item">Rosemary: Imagine a spa day for your hair. Rosemary adds that calming, refreshing scent to your locks while also promoting hair growth and keeping it healthy.</span></li>
   </ul>
   <p></p>
   <p class="a-spacing-base">With these fantastic ingredients, Pro Series Shampoo takes your hair from dull to dazzling, making it the ultimate treat for your locks. Say hello to hair that's soft, strong, and irresistibly beautiful!</p>

title: Pro Series Daily Hair Care Set - Shampoo, Conditioner & Leave-In | Hydrating, Anti-Frizz, and Heat Protectant for Lace Wigs & Hair Systems | 8 Fl Oz each
body_html:
Experience gentle cleansing, deep hydration, and lasting frizz control for your wigs and hair systems with our Pro Series Shampoo, Conditioner, and Leave-In Spray; apply shampoo and conditioner in the shower, then spritz the leave-in on wet or dry hair for softness, shine, and tangle-free styling all day.

  • GENTLE, EFFECTIVE CARE FOR YOUR WIG & HAIR SYSTEM Maintain the health and vibrancy of your lace wigs, toupees, and hair systems with the Pro Series Shampoo, Conditioner, and Leave-In 8oz Set. Each product in this trio works together to cleanse, nourish, and protect, ensuring your hair systems look and feel their best.
  • SULFATE-FREE SHAMPOO FOR GENTLE CLEANSING Our Pro Series Shampoo gently removes buildup, oil, and residue from your hair systems. Infused with natural ingredients like Aloe and Argan Oil, it refreshes your wig without stripping away moisture, keeping it soft and vibrant.
  • CONDITIONER TO RESTORE MOISTURE AND SMOOTHNESS The Pro Series Conditioner provides intense hydration, leaving hair systems smooth and frizz-free. With a blend of Argan Oil and Cucumber, it detangles and strengthens hair, enhancing its shine and manageability.
  • LEAVE-IN SPRAY FOR ALL-DAY HYDRATION AND FRIZZ CONTROL Our Pro Series Leave-In Conditioner Spray is a daily treatment designed to keep hair systems tangle-free and hydrated. This lightweight spray adds moisture, prevents matting, and provides a protective layer against heat and humidity for a polished finish.
  • How to Use: Shampoo: Apply a small amount to wet hair, gently massage into the scalp and hair system, then rinse thoroughly for a clean, fresh finish. Conditioner: After shampooing, apply evenly through damp hair, focusing on the lengths and ends. Leave for 2-3 minutes, then rinse well. Leave-In Spray: Spray onto wet or dry hair, focusing on areas prone to tangles or frizz. Comb through to distribute evenly, then style as desired.

title: Pro Series Leave In
body_html:
Your hair replacement unit is an investment in you so keep your locks looking strong and healthy with Pro Hair Lab’s daily Leave-In Conditioner. This special formula is designed to infuse your hair with softness while controlling itch and scalp oil. Our Pro Series Leave-In Conditioner keeps your hair looking great and provides protection from wear and tear and harsh environmental situations. To use, spray over hair and allow the mist to settle for five seconds, comb through and repeat as necessary. Available in a 12.0-ounce spray bottle. Use daily with Pro Hair Lab’s Pro Series Shampoo and Conditioner for best results.

  • Pro Series Leave-In Conditioner by Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated to control itch and scalp oil while infusing your hair with softness.
  • Professional-grade leave-in conditioner is gentle enough for everyday use. Use with Pro Series Shampoo and Conditioner for best results.
  • Easy to use. Simply mist your hair from the roots to the tips and allow the solution to settle for five seconds.
  • No harsh chemical means it is 100% safe.

title: Pro Series Leave In Conditioner Spray 8oz - Daily Hair Care Treatment, Heat Protectant, Anti-Frizz, Moisturizes, Detangles & Restores Damaged Hair for Healthy & Smooth Lace Wig, Toupee & Hair Systems
body_html:
• YOUR DAILY HAIR CARE: Embrace hassle-free mornings with our Pro Series Leave-In Conditioner, made in Ireland. Designed for daily use, it untangles, hydrates, and guards against matting and knots, all while enhancing your hair's ability to retain moisture.
  • CONTROLS FRIZZ AND HAIR DAMAGE: Control frizz and revive your hair's vitality with our Hair Leave In Spray. Packed with Argan oil, it strengthens, volumizes, hydrates, and adds a radiant shine. Your hair system gets 24-hour protection, preventing static, dryness, and tangles.
  • REVIVE YOUR HAIR'S NATURAL BEAUTY: Imagine your hair getting a special treat with our Leave In Conditioner. It helps your hair become fuller and smoother, and there won't be any greasy stuff on your hairpiece's base. Your hair will look and feel amazing – Enjoy the transformation!
  • GENTLE INGREDIENTS FOR HEALTHY HAIR: From crown to tips, experience the ultimate care for your hair with our sulfate-free, non-harming formula. Free from parabens, phthalates, and artificial fragrances, it ensures beautifully conditioned hair without any skin irritation.
  • EASY TO USE: Just spray it on your wet or dry hair, then use a comb or run your fingers through for hair that's soft, hydrated, and free from tangles. If you have knots that are hard to untangle, spray a lot and use a comb with wide teeth. It's simple and makes your hair feel great!

Meticulously crafted from high-grade lace, this men's toupee is enhanced with a 1.5-inch polyurethane reinforcement strip around the edges. The innovative combination of these materials offers the breathability of lace with the robust bonding capabilities of polyurethane. The unique dual-base construction opens up a variety of secure bonding options, making it compatible with both liquid adhesives and tapes. While this blend of base materials provides a unique set of advantages, it complements our range of all-lace and all-skin options, allowing you to choose a hair system that aligns perfectly with your lifestyle, preferences, and needs. Density: Boasts a medium density (110-120%), providing a fuller yet natural appearance. Wave/Curl: Styled with a standard body wave for added versatility. title: Quick Aggressive Contours Tape Strips
body_html:
Used for foil and net adhesive surfaces, this medical-grade Toupee and Wig Tape has a bit more flexibility to it making it very durable during the application process. Very popular in European markets, this tape will last for 1-2 weeks and provides for easy clean ups. Often compared to 1522, it is a bit more versatile and aggressive than 1522 and is gaining traction in US markets.

  • Base: All
  • Medical Grade
  • Hold: Extended Wear (1-2 weeks)
  • Comparable: Walker's SuperStick®

Directions: 

Step 1: Peel the scored line on strips and contours
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply it to your client's scalp.

 

All contours come in packs of 36

Often compared to 1522, it is a bit more versatile and aggressive than 1522 and is gaining traction in US markets.

Step 1: Peel and cut the desired length
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply it to your client's scalp.

title: Rapid Release Solvent Spray
body_html:
Our fastest-acting solvent, ideal for solvent soaks.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Oil
  • Gentleness: Do not use on skin
  • Breakdown Speed: Fast
  • Residue: Medium
  • Cleanup: Rinse with soap and water
  • Fragrance: Citrus
  • Flammable
  • Professional Use Only
  • Fast Acting
  • Rinses off with soap and water

Ingredients

Hydrocarbon Solvent, Fragrance

Directions:

  1. Spray onto adhesive in unit.
  2. Do NOT apply directly to skin.
  3. Breakdown will begin in seconds.
  4. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup.
  5. Wipe or brush off residue.
  6. Shampoo and rinse.

SOAK OFF DIRECTIONS

  1. Fill large bowl with solvent.
  2. Place the unit base side up at bottom of container and let soak.
  3. Keep the unit submerged while wearing gloves and working off the adhesive.
  4. Shampoo unit and rinse.

Cautions

  • Close cap tightly.
  • Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
  • Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
  • Do not breathe fumes.
  • External use only, do not ingest.
  • Avoid eye contact.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • Test on a small area before use.
  • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F.

SDS Sheet (PDF)

Available Sizes

  • Drip Top 4 oz
  • Gallon (128 oz)

title: Remove-All
body_html:
Rejuvenate your skin between adhesive applications with Pro Hair Labs’ Remove-All Exfoliating Gel. This unique gel is specially formulated with hypo-allergenic scrubbing beads to exfoliate by gently removing layers of dead skin build-up revealing a healthy, glowing scalp. Remove-All Exfoliating Gel does not contain any harsh chemicals, allergens such as nut shells or toxins so you can feel confident that this product is 100% safe and gentle on your delicate skin. The mildly exfoliating gel also helps control skin oils for a better adhesive bond.

  • Remove-All Exfoliating Gel from Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated to gently remove layers of dead skin from your scalp between adhesive applications.
  • Gentle exfoliating beads leave your skin soft, smooth and healthy.
  • Hypo-allogenic. Contains no harsh chemicals or toxins so it is gentle on skin.
  • Use before each adhesive application to prepare the skin for a strong bond.

Remove-All Exfoliating Gel from Pro Hair Labs is specially formulated to gently remove layers of dead skin from your scalp between adhesive applications.

title: Safe Hold Water-Based While Liquid Adhesive
body_html:
Water-based, LuxHair's Safe Hold Liquid Glue allows adhering different hair systems to the scalp with a totally natural finish, leaving the hair root loose. Very resistant glue, unbelievably easy to apply and clean.

 

Advantages

  • Transparent, matte finish, and no shine glue.
  • Extra natural finish.
  • Strong hold up to 4 days with touch-up.
  • Leaves very little residue, very easy to clean.
  • Specific formulation for hair adhesion.

 

Format

Quantity: 38 ml.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Apply to the scalp and not to the hair system.
  • Apply to the outer edge of the desired area to be bonded. Then spread the product evenly, applying the right amount to create a thin layer.
  • Applying at least 2 or 3 layers is highly recommended, allowing the glue to dry 2-3 minutes between each coat application.
  • Allow the glue to dry for a few minutes before attaching your capillary system.

title: Safe-Grip White Adhesive
body_html:
For Extended Wear clients preferring a water-based liquid adhesive.

Good water-based liquid adhesives are hard to find which is why we offer Safe-Grip! It is a high-quality, extended wear, water-based adhesive. It’s perfect for all systems and is gentle on your client’s skin.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Water
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Hold: 1-3 Weeks
  • Waterproof
  • Nonflammable
  • Non-toxic
  • Non-stringy
  • Low Odor

Ingredients

Acetoxyenthylene, Dimethylcarbinol

Directions:

  1. Prepare client’s scalp with 99% Alcohol.
  2. Use sponge brushes to apply a thin, even coat of SAFE GRIP to scalp.
  3. Blow dry until clear.
  4. Repeat once more, then press hair system onto scalp, firmly holding for 10 seconds.
  5. Remind client to wait 24 hours before swimming, shampooing, or working out.

Cautions

  • Close cap tightly.
  • Do not breathe fumes.
  • Store below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • External use only.
  • Avoid eye contact.

title: Scalp Protector Liquid
body_html:
Specifically formulated to create a very thin, shine-free film that protects the scalp, preventing damage to the scalp during the application of hair adhesives and improving the adhesion of hair adhesives.

 

Advantages

  • Protects the scalp, preventing irritation.
  • Creates a very thin and undetectable protective film.
  • Improves considerably the adhesion of tapes and liquid adhesives.

 

Format

  • Each bottle, roll-on or spray, contains 50mL of product.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Spread Scalp Protector with the cloth applicator on the areas of the scalp where the liquid adhesive or tape is to be applied later.
  • After application, allow the liquid to dry until it is no longer sticky to the touch. A hairdryer can be used to speed up the drying process.
  • For hygienic reasons, it is recommended that the use is personal so that the same applicator is not used for different hairpieces users.

title: Stick It Contour Tape Strips
body_html:
Looking for a light, thin Toupee and Wig tape that holds like the Hoover Dam? Look no further than Stick It. Stick It can provide 1-2 weeks of rock-solid hold and defies breakdowns with ease. It is incredibly lightweight and comfortable on the scalp. In the words of our friends over at Hair Direct “Hard to believe something this thin provides an incredible hold—but it does!” Not only does this tape boast an amazingly high tack, but it is also fairly easy-to-clean up. We put years of industry knowledge behind this Wig and Toupee tape so that once you detach it, it virtually peels right off. Our Stick It is sweat-proof and is tried and tested to keep a tight bond even in the most humid, damp environments like sunny South Florida. Being based in South Florida, we know how important appearances are so we engineered this Toupee and Wig tape to have exceedingly low shine as to not attract any unwanted attention.

  • Base: Lace
  • Shine: Low
  • Medical Grade
  • Hold: Extended Wear (1-2 Weeks)

Directions: 

Step 1: Peel the scored line on strips and contours
Step 2: Place tape onto the system where you want it, carefully avoiding touching the adhesive. 
Step 3: Remove the remaining liner, and apply it to your client's scalp.

 

All contours come in packs of 36

title: Super Hold Water-base Liquid Adhesive
body_html:
Water-based liquid adhesive aimed at attaching hair prostheses or other hair systems, such as wigs and hair extensions, to the scalp. The result is matte, which gives a more natural finish, leaving the hair root loose and dull while providing an extra strong hold.

 

Advantages

  • Matte and no-shine finish.
  • Loos Hair root.
  • Extra resistance to water, perspiration, and high temperatures.
  • Long-lasting hold: Approximately 6 days with touch-up.
  • The perfect solution for intensive physical activities.
  • Specific formulation for hair systems such as hairpieces, wigs, and extensions.

 

Format

Quantity: 38 ml.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Apply to the scalp and not to the hair system.
  • Apply to the outer edge of the desired area to be bonded. Then spread the product evenly, applying the right amount to create a thin layer.
  • Applying at least 2 or 3 layers is highly recommended, allowing the glue to dry 2-3 minutes between each coat application.
  • Allow the glue to dry for a few minutes before attaching your capillary system.

title: Top-Loc Knot Sealer
body_html:
Top-Loc Knot Sealer is one of the best ways to extend the life of mesh systems. After a while of wear, the knots of tied hair can start to loosen. Top-Loc Knot Sealer helps prevent that by helping keep these delicate knots tied tight.

Specs

  • Systems: Mesh
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Low odor for convenient indoor use
  • Flammable
  • Professional use only
  • Shake well
  • Test on small area before use
  • Do not apply to severely irritated skin

Ingredients

Isopropyl Alcohol, H2O, Copolymers

Directions:

  1. Spray onto the inside of mesh hair system.
  2. Let dry to ensure seal.
  3. Apply unit as normal.

Cautions

  • Store below 90°F.
  • Test on small area before use.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • External use only.
  • Avoid eye contact.
  • Tighten cap promptly after use.
  • Do not apply to severely irritated skin.
  • Flammable.
  • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.

title: Type II Remover
body_html:
To really get your hair system looking like new again, nothing can beat the Transdermal Type II Remover from Pro Hair Labs. This adhesive residue remover is tough on glue and can tackle a wide range of hair adhesive products, from co-polymers to latex and everything in between. The beauty of Transdermal Type II is that it will blast away all remains of the cosmetic bonding product, whilst still looking after the hair system.

With citrus-based cleaners and no toxic ingredients, Transdermal Type II cares for your hair system, helping it to keep its colour and condition for longer. Pro Hair Labs have formulated this adhesive residue remover to be high performance but without the use of lanolin or aloe ingredients. We know these particular ingredients can leave hair systems oily, causing problems with cosmetic bonding and a poor appearance. With Transdermal Type II Remover, you can be sure of breathing new life into your hair system every time you clean.

Transdermal Type II Remover is a safety first formulation that does not contain aloe or lanolin. Aloe and Lanolin are common ingredients that cause oil barriers on the hair unit. We have formulated this product specifically for hair units and it will not leave excess oil on your lace or poly base.

To really get your hair system looking like new again, nothing can beat the Transdermal Type II Remover from Pro Hair Labs.

Adhesivo líquido con base acuosa que permite adherir al cuero cabelludo prótesis capilares u otros sistemas capilares tales como pelucas y extensiones. El resultado es mate, lo que permite un acabado mas natural dejando la raíz del cabello suelta y sin brillo y aportando una sujeción extra fuerte.

Beneficios

  • Acabado mate y sin brillo.
  • Extra resistente al agua, la sudoración y las altas temperaturas.
  • Sujeción de muy larga duración: 10-15 días.
  • Perfecto para actividades con esfuerzo intensivo.
Formato

Cantidad: 50mL.

 

Recomendaciones de uso
  • Administrar de forma homogénea sobre el cuero cabelludo y no sobre el sistema capilar.
  • Aplicar 2-3 capas de adhesivo. Se recomienda aplicar la cantidad justa para generar cada capa dejando secar dos minutos entre capa y capa.
  • Dejar que se seque unos minutos antes de adherir el sistema capilar.

Walker Tape's Ultra Hold Acrylic-Based Clear Hair Systems Adhesive

Ultra-Hold Acrylic Adhesive

Walker Tape's Ultra-Hold is one of the strongest bond liquid adhesive on the market for over 15 years and one of the most popular Maximum Wear adhesive. An acrylic adhesive with consistent 3-4+ week hold time.

Ultra Hold is one of our best Maximum Hold liquid adhesives. It has an acrylic-base and cleans up quickly and easily. Its reliable hold can be used on all systems and can last for over four weeks when applied and cared for correctly.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Acrylic

Isopropanol, Ethyl Acetate, Heptane, Toluene

title: Ultra Hold Tape Contour Strips
body_html:
Ultra Hold Tape Contour Strips by Walker Tape is the ultimate in extended use wear tape for hair systems which can hold for up to 4+ weeks.

Ultra Hold Tape Contour Strips is made from Urethane and with a dull finish it has an extremely flexible bond making it great for use with lace systems.

  • New design backing liner carries the Walker Tape logo – ‘W ULTRA-HOLD’

Ultra Hold Tape has become the number 1 market leader in double sided tapes for Hair Systems. You wont find longer hold times or a more secure bond. Depending on your personal body chemistry and lifestyle a 4+ week hold is very achievable.

“This tape is great! If you like Super Tape, you will love this tape. It gives you stronger hold and this tape has no shine effect detected through your lace system”

“It gave me the best hold time that I have ever experienced, twenty three days. During that time I didnt have to do any front hairline touch up, as I normally do”

What sets Ultra Hold Tape apart is the fingerprint in the tape. Basically the fingerprint keeps the tape from shining which makes the unit less detectable. It is super tacky,  flexible and waterproof so you can swim, shower and live your life without worry of it letting go.

  • Packs of 36 pcs
  • 2-4 week hold time
  • Super tacky,  flexible and waterproof
  • New design backing liner carries the Walker Tape logo – ‘W ULTRA-HOLD’
  • The liner is white but the actual tape is clear.

Manufacturer: Walker Tape – the leader in Hair Replacement supplies

Walker Tape Description

Ultra Hold Tape is the most tacky, flexible, and long-lasting tape we make. Comparable to Super Tape, Air Flex, and GeoBond, you will get the longest hold you’ve ever had from a tape. Ultra Hold can hold strong for 6+ Weeks. It has a urethane carrier that is extra stretchy, making it comfortable to wear and great for flexible lace base materials. It also features our ‘fingerprint’ textured pattern to reduce shine. The liner is white but the actual tape is clear.

Hold: Maximum wear (2-4+ weeks) tapes are the longest lasting tapes we make. Depending on temperature, humidity, and body oils, they can last up to six weeks. Because they’re usually the most tacky, they require more skill to apply.

Ultra Hold Tape is best removed with C22 solvent.

  • Hold up to three weeks.
  • Easy to clean.
  • Specific formulation for hair bonding: hair prosthesis, wigs, and extensions.

 

Format

Bottle with a brush for easy application.

Quantity: 15 ml.

 

Recommendations for use

  • Apply to the scalp and not to the hair system.
  • Apply to the outer edge of the desired area to be bonded. Then spread the product evenly, applying the right amount to create a thin layer.
  • Applying at least 2 or 3 layers is highly recommended, allowing the glue to dry 2-3 minutes between each coat application.
  • Allow the glue to dry for a few minutes before attaching your capillary system.

title: Walker Signature Remover
body_html:
If you’re looking for a medical grade solvent, Walker Signature Remover is for you. This solvent is gentle, while working very quickly. It’s oil-based, and is ideal for clients with sensitive skin.

Space

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Oil
  • Gentleness: Medical grade
  • Breakdown Speed: Fast
  • Residue: High
  • Cleanup: Rinse with mild soap and water
  • Fragrance: Pleasant mild citrus
  • Flammable
  • Organic
  • Professional Use Only
  • Fast Acting
  • Rinses off with soap and water

Ingredients

Natural Oils, Aloe Vera, Lanolin, Organic Wetting Agents

Directions:

  1. Saturate adhesive area.
  2. Breakdown will begin in seconds.
  3. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup.
  4. Wipe or brush off residue.
  5. Shampoo and rinse.

    Cautions

    • Close cap tightly.
    • Do not leave on silicone bases more than 2-3 minutes.
    • Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
    • Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
    • Do not breathe fumes.
    • External use only, do not ingest.
    • Avoid eye contact.
    • Keep out of reach of children.
    • Test on a small area before use.
    • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
    • Store at room temperature, below 90°F.

    SDS Sheet (PDF)

    Available Sizes

    • Spray 4 oz

title: Walker Signature Tape Contours & Minis
body_html:
Our Signature Tape is the thinnest 4+ week tape on the market! It’s only 6.5mils thick. Most 4+ week hold tapes are around 10-11mils thick. We started with our Ultra Hold Tape and made it thinner and stronger. The combination of the dull finish, flexible liner, and incredibly thin construction makes this tape incredibly comfortable to wear and gives a lifelike appearance. Because it’s so thin, it also leaves behind less residue than any other 4+ week tape, making it far easier to clean after removal. The tape is clear with a white liner. It is ideal for lace units.

Main Points

Hold: Maximum wear (2-4+ weeks) tapes are the longest lasting tapes we make. Depending on temperature, humidity, and body oils, they can last up to six weeks. Because they’re usually the most tacky, they require more skill to apply. You can expect a 4+ week hold from this tape.

Mil Thickness

Thickness: 6.5 mil

Directions:

  1. Peel the scored liner off
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive
  3. Place the piece where desired on the hair system
  4. Repeat as needed
  5. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining liner pieces
  6. For easier application use Just-Rite Positioning Spray

Available Sizes

  • Rolls: 3yd, 12yd, 36yd
  • Contours: A, AA, B, BB, C, CC
  • Straight Strips: 1/2″ x 3″, 3/4″ x 3″, 1″ x 3″
  • Minis

Specs

  • Systems: All
  • Dullness: Dull (great for lace)
  • Gentleness: Skin Safe
  • Residue: Medium
  • Liner: Printed White (tape is clear)
  • Thickness: 6.5 mil
  • Apply with care: Its comfortable mesh construction can tear when stretched
  • Maximum Wear: 4+ Weeks
  • Store at room temperature, below 90°F
  • Test on small area before use

title: Walker Solvent
body_html:
When working with a lot of clients, plus all of their hair systems, having a good, budget-friendly solvent is the way to go. That’s why we offer Walker Solvent. It’s skin safe and starts working quickly.

Main Points

  • Systems: All
  • Base: Oil
  • Gentleness: Skin safe
  • Breakdown Speed: Medium
  • Residue: Low
  • Cleanup: Rinse with mild soap and water
  • Flammable
  • Professional Use Only
  • Fast Acting
  • Rinses off with soap and water

Ingredients

Hydrocarbon Solvent, Fragrance

Directions:

  1. Saturate adhesive area.
  2. Breakdown will begin in seconds.
  3. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup.
  4. Wipe or brush off residue.
  5. Shampoo and rinse.

SOAK OFF DIRECTIONS

  1. Fill large bowl with solvent.
  2. Place the unit base side up at bottom of container and let soak.
  3. Keep the unit submerged while wearing gloves and working off the adhesive.
  4. Shampoo unit and rinse.

    Cautions

    • Close cap tightly.
    • Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
    • Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
    • Do not breathe fumes.
    • External use only, do not ingest.
    • Avoid eye contact.
    • Keep out of reach of children.
    • Test on a small area before use.
    • Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
    • Store at room temperature, below 90°F.

    SDS Sheet (PDF)

    Available Sizes

    • Drip Top 4 oz
    • Gallon (128 oz)

title: XL 1.3oz & HD Wig Cap (2 Pcs) Set | Secure, Breathable Wig Cap with Invisible, Water-Resistant Adhesive for Lace Front Wigs & Hairpieces
body_html:
Achieve a secure, natural-looking hair system with the GHOSTBOND XL 1.3oz and Wig Cap Set. Designed for professional-quality results, this duo combines a strong, invisible bonding adhesive with a premium stretchy wig cap for comfort and precision. GHOSTBOND XL offers a long-lasting hold that resists water, oil, and humidity, keeping your wig firmly in place throughout the day. The ultra-thin, breathable wig cap provides a perfect foundation, ensuring a seamless finish and a natural appearance.

  • PREMIUM BONDING AND SUPPORT FOR YOUR WIG This set includes the perfect combination of our trusted GHOSTBOND XL 1.3oz Hair Replacement Adhesive and a premium HD Wig Cap. Designed to provide a secure, natural-looking hold for your lace wigs and hair systems, this set ensures a flawless and comfortable experience every time.
  • BREATHABLE AND MOISTURE-CONTROL FABRIC FOR SCALP HEALTH The breathable fabric of our HD Wig Cap allows for ventilation, reducing scalp perspiration and ensuring your hairpiece stays comfortable all day. By minimizing sweat buildup, it helps keep the wig adhesive secure and reduces the risk of any discomfort or odor. This added breathability is perfect for extended wear, ensuring your scalp feels fresh and your wig remains in place.
  • LIGHT-HOLD, INVISIBLE BONDING FOR NATURAL LOOKS GHOSTBOND XL is formulated to offer a strong, invisible hold while keeping your hair system looking natural. Whether you're wearing a lace wig, poly system, or toupee, this adhesive gently adheres to your skin, blending seamlessly with your hairline for an undetectable finish.
  • ULTRA-THIN HD WIG CAP FOR NATURAL HAIRLINE AND ALL-DAY COMFORT Crafted from premium, stretchy nylon, our HD Wig Cap is designed to provide an invisible foundation for your wig. The cap is ultra-thin and lightweight, allowing it to sit flat on your scalp, minimizing any visible lines or bunching. It’s perfect for achieving a seamless hairline and a natural appearance under your lace wig or toupee. The HD Wig Cap is one-size-fits-all with enough flexibility to comfortably fit most head sizes and hair types without slipping.
› See more product details

  • PRECISE APPLICATION FOR A FLAWLESS INSTALL Achieve a flawless wig install every time with the GHOSTBOND XL 1.3oz Adhesive and premium silicone applicator. This combination allows for smooth and even adhesive application, ensuring a secure, invisible bond for lace wigs and hair systems.
  • SILICONE APPLICATOR FOR EVEN DISTRIBUTION The included silicone applicator is designed for precision and ease. Its soft, flexible tip ensures the adhesive is spread evenly across the hairline, preventing clumping or uneven bonds. The applicator allows you to control the amount of adhesive applied, giving you professional results at home.
  • LIGHT-HOLD, WATER & OIL-RESISTANT ADHESIVE GHOSTBOND XL is trusted for providing a long-lasting hold that remains invisible on the scalp. Its water-resistant and oil-resistant formula keeps your lace wig secure in humid environments or with oily skin, giving you confidence all day long.

Ghostbond XL Glue Pen delivers a long-lasting, invisible hold for lace and poly wigs, withstanding sweat, humidity, and high temperatures.
